cu rtsa gnyis kyis ni yang dag par brgyan/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus ni rnam par spras/ mdzes shing dang ba dang / dbang po ni zhi/ thugs ni zhi/ dul ba dang / zhi gnas dam pa ni brnyes/ dul ba dang / zhi gnas mchog gi pha rol tu ni phyin/ mi mjed kyi bdag po

tshangs pa dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu stong dag gis ni phyag byas/ bdud rtsi'i char gyi rgyun rab tu 'bebs shing mchod pa dang / me tog man dA ra ba'i char 'bebs shing / tsan dan gyi khyams dang khang

mngon par gshegs te/ de lta bas na/ bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang thabs cig tu sems can dag yang dag par dga' bar mdzad cing / tsan dan gyi khyams dang khang mngon par gshegs so/ /dge ba'i pha rol 'gro'i bram ze dang / khyim

bdag gis bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang thabs cig tu bar snang las gshegs pa mthong ste/ 'di lta ste dper na/ ngang pa'i rgyal po chen po lta bur mthong nas/ srog chags khri dag chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral te

rnam par dag go/ /gang dag sngon gyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la spyad pa'i srog chags khri dag gis ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul mthong nas/ byang chub tu sems bskyed de/ de dag byang chub tu sems bskyed ma thag tu mi skye ba'i chos la bzod

pa thob bo/ /sngon sems ma bskyed pa'i srog chags khri dag gis ni byang chub tu sems bskyed do/ /nyan thos dag gis 'dul ba'i srog chags brgyad khri dag ni nyan thos kyi rdzu 'phrul mthong nas chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral te rnam par dag go/ /lha'i

bu khri dag gis ni bcom ldan 'das kyi rdzu 'phrul mthong nas/ chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral te rnam par dag go/ /gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i bu khri dag gis ni/ chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral te rnam par dag pa nas/

phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob pa'i bar du gyur to/ /de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis dri za'i rgyal po'i bu gtsug phud lnga pa la smras pa/ gtsug phud lnga pa de bzhin gshegs pa la bkur sti gyis shig /dri za'i rgyal po'i bu gtsug phud lnga pas de ltar 'tshal lo zhes

lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyi ltar mnyan te/ dri za sa ya phrag drug dag dang lhan cig tu rgyud kyi dbyangs dang / glu'i dbyangs kyis de bzhin gshegs pa la bkur sti byed do/ /rol mo'i sgra dang glu sgra de dag gis rgya mtsho chen po'i klu'i rgyal po de dag rab tu dga' zhing bde ba

dang yid bde ba skyes nas rang rang gi gnas nas byung ngo / /de dag byung bas rgya mtsho chen po na 'byung po chen po dag gi gnas rnam par 'khrugs so/ /klu'i rgyal po mdzes pa la sogs pa klu dung phyur phrag brgyad dag bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir rgya mtsho chen po nas

bskyod do/ /klu'i rgyal po lha mdzes la sogs pa klu dung phyur phrag dgu dag bcom ldan 'das la blta ba dang / phyag bya ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir bskyod do/ /klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho la pa klu dung phyur phrag dgu dag bcom ldan 'das blta ba'i phyir

rgya mtsho chen po nas bskyod do/ /klu'i rgyal po gser gtsug la sogs pa klu dung phyur phrag dgu dag bcom ldan 'das blta ba'i phyir bskyod do/ /klu'i rgyal po ud pa la mig la sogs pa klu dung phyur phrag dgu dag bcom ldan 'das blta ba'i phyir bskyod do/ /klu'i

rgyal po dga' bo la sogs pa klu dung phyur phrag dgu nas/ de bzhin du sbyar te thams cad la yang bya'o/ /klu'i rgyal po nye dga' la sogs pa klu dung phyur phrag dgu dang / klu'i rgyal po ma dros pa la sogs pa klu dung phyur phrag dgu dang / klu'i rgyal po e la'i rA ba Na la

pa klu dung phyur phrag dgu dang / klu'i rgyal po chib pa'i bu la sogs pa klu dung phyur phrag dgu dang / klu'i rgyal po mig nag pa la sogs pa klu dung phyur phrag dgu dang / klu'i rgyal po gau ta ma la sogs pa klu dung phyur phrag dgu dang / klu'i rgyal po kam pa la la sogs pa klu dung phyur

phrag dgu dang / klu'i rgyal po yul 'khor srung la sogs pa klu dung phyur phrag dgu dang / klu'i rgyal po mgrin sngon la sogs pa klu dung phyur phrag dgu dang / klu'i rgyal po gser mgrin la sogs pa klu dung phyur phrag dgu dang / klu'i rgyal po 'jigs sgros la pa klu

dung phyur phrag dgu dang / klu'i rgyal po gzi can la sogs pa klu dung phyur phrag dgu dang / klu'i rgyal po rnam par snang byed la sogs pa klu dung phyur phrag dgu dang / klu'i rgyal po rdul bral la pa klu dung phyur phrag dgu nas/ de bzhin du sbyar te/ klu'i rgyal po 'od chen la

sogs pa dang / klu'i rgyal po rab tu gdung byed la sogs pa dang / klu'i rgyal po stobs chen la sogs pa dang / klu'i rgyal po sprin chen la sogs pa dang / klu'i rgyal po zla chen la sogs pa klu dung phyur phrag dgu dang / rlung yang dag par ston pa la sogs pa klu dung

phyur phrag dgu dang / klu'i rgyal po shugs 'dzin la sogs pa klu dung phyur phrag dgu dang / klu'i rgyal po sprin chen la sogs pa dang / klu'i rgyal po rab tu gdul dka' la sogs pa dang / klu'i rgyal po thams cad me long zhes bya ba klu dung phyur phrag dgu dang /

klu'i rgyal po char chen spyod la sogs pa klu dung phyur phrag dgu dag /bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir/ rgya mtsho chen po nas bskyod do/ /de dag la sogs pa klu bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong dpag tu med pa gzhan dag dang / 'khor dung phyur phrag dgu dag bcom ldan 'das

la blta ba'i phyir rgya mtsho chen po nas bskyod do/ /de dag gis rgya mtsho chen po dkrugs so/ /dge slong de dag gis kyang grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / tshong 'dus dang / ri 'or sa dang bcas pa dkrugs so/ /de nas sa rnam pa du mar g.yos/ rab tu g.yos/

kun tu rab tu g.yos/ 'gul rab tu 'gul/ kun tu rab tu 'gul/ ldeg rab tu ldeg /kun tu rab tu ldeg go/ /de nas khyim bdag phywa mkhan gyis sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun la bza' ba dang / bca' ba dang / myang ba bzang zhing rab tu

mang po rang gi lag gis yang dag par tshim par byas shing yang dag par brims so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag su'i bsod snyoms kyang yongs su bza' bar mi bya ste/ grong khyer chen po dge ba'i pha rol

'gro ba 'di klu dkrugs pa dag gis grong khyer ma rung bar byas sa re/ de nas bcom ldan 'das bsod snyoms bzhes nas nam mkha' la mngon par 'phags te/ 'di lta ste dper na/ ngang pa'i rgyal po chen po bzhin no/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gi dge 'dun

phyir bkye nas gnas su sprul pa brgya stong phrag dpag tu med pa dag mngon par sprul to/ /der klu'i rgyal po gang dag bcom ldan 'das blta bar 'dod pa de dag la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa mngon par sprul to/ /klu'i rgyal po gang dag bcom ldan 'das la ma dad cing blta bar mi

'dod pa de dag yongs su smin par bya ba'i don du 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag dpag tu med pa dag mngon par sprul to/ /der klu bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag dpag tu med pa dag mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob bo/ /klu bye ba khrag khrig dpag tu med pa dag ni sangs rgyas la

dad pa skyes so/ /de dag dad pa thob ma thag tu klu'i skye gnas de nas shi ste/ bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten du skyes so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis klu bye ba khrag khrig dpag tu med pa de dag btul nas bsod snyoms bzhes te bar snang la gshegs so/ /de'i tshe na yul lag

mthil ltar mnyam pa na dka' thub can mes byin zhes bya ba zhig gnas te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das nam mkha'i bar snang las gshegs pa mthong ngo / /de mthong nas kyang bcom ldan 'das la shin tu gus pa bskyed nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan

'das bdag la mtshan ma'i rnam pa de bzhin du mdzad du gsol/ gang bdag gi gnas 'dir bzhugs na mchod par bgyi'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ral pa can mes byin gyi bsam pa thugs su chud nas/ skye bo phyi ma dag nyid la thugs brtse ba'i slad du rdo leb la zhabs

bzhag go/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ral pa can mes byin la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /bram ze khyod kyi sems dad par bya ba'i don du 'di ni mchod rten no/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po la bka' stsal pa/ maud gal gyi bu tshur

shog /ma dros pa'i mtsho ga la ba der 'dong ngo / bcom ldan 'das legs so zhes gsol nas/ tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan nas/ klu'i rgyal po ma dros pa'i gnas kyi chu 'gram du bzhugs so/ /de nas klu'i rgyal po ma dros

pa bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa gshegs par rig nas/ gser dang / dngul dang / baidU r+ya dang / shel dang / mu tig dmar po dang / spug gi snying po dang / rdo'i snying po rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'i stan lnga brgya tsam zhig mngon par sprul to/ /

khri stan lnga brgya de dag gi dbus su bcom ldan 'das kyi gdan rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'i gdan bshams te/ klu'i ras bcos bus g.yogs so/ /de nas klu'i rgyal po ma dros pa klu'i bu mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa bcom ldan 'das kyi drung du song ngo / /de nas

bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po zan zos shing lhung bzed dang lag pa bkrus par thugs su chud nas bka' stsal pa/ maud gal gyi bu song la gnas brtan shA ri'i bu khyod la ston pa 'bod do zhes smros shig /bcom ldan 'das legs so zhes gsol

te/ tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan nas/ 'di lta ste dper na/ skyes bu stobs dang ldan pa'i lag pa bskum pa rkyong ba'am/ brkyang ba skum pa de bzhin du tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po ma dros pa'i mtsho nas byung ste/

rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal na tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu'i mdun na 'dug go/ /de'i tshe na tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu snam sbyar 'drub par gyur to/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang lhan cig tu yang dag par dga' ba'i gtam dang gtam snyan pa

rnam pa mang po byas nas/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so/ /ston pa ni tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu khyod la 'bod de/ ston pa khyod la mngon par dgyes kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu tshur shog /ston pa khyod la gsung gis 'dong ngo / /de skad ces smras

pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po la 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po re shig snam sbyar 'di 'tshem mo/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos sor mo lnga khab lngar mngon par sprul nas snam sbyar

de btsems so/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po la 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu 'di ci byed smras pa/ snam sbyar btsem par bya ba 'di myur du btsem par bya'o/ /smras pa/ drub pa dang zin pa nyid du gyis shig /

de ma thag tu drubs shing zin pa nyid du byas nas/ smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu tshur shog da 'dong / smras pa/ mi 'gro'o/ /smras pa/ gal te khyed mi 'gro na stobs kyis bkur ro/ /smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu re shig ska rags 'di stobs kyis khyer nus dang nga stobs

kyis khyer bar shes so/ /des ska rags de 'jig rten gyi khams bdun du byin gyis brlabs so/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos ska rags de rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis bteg pa na stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di g.yos kyang ska rags de gdeg

par ma nus so/ /de nas ma dros pa'i mtsho rlabs shin tu g.yos so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du dog sa chen po g.yos pa byung ba 'di rgyu gang lags/ rkyen gang lags/ de skad ces

gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis rta thul la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /nyan thos chen po'i rnam par 'phrul pa'o/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu la 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu je bzhud cig /bdag kyang

mchi'o/ /de skad smras nas/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar song nas zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ /tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po ni phyi nas 'ong ngo / /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu mngon du phyogs pa'i rdzu 'phrul

thob pas de dang por bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar song nas 'dug go/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis mtshan ma de lta bu byung ba mdzad pa'i mtshan ma ji lta bu byung ba mdzad pas rgya mtsho'i klu'i rgyal po bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ /de nas bcom

ldan 'das la klu'i rgyal po mdzes 'di skad ces gsol to/ /gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la skabs phye na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa la bdag phyogs 'ga' zhig zhu'o/ /bka' stsal pa/ mdzes dga' ngas zhu ba lung bstan pa'i phyir 'di

ltar thams cad skabs dbye bar bya'o/ /tshigs su bcad pa/ ston pa bde byin mdzad la zhu ba ni/ /spyad pa spyod tshe sug las ci bgyis dang / /bde ba'i lam gyis mya ngan 'das reg pa/ /bde gshegs sbyin mdzad de ni lung bstan gsol/ /ma dros

klu yi 'jig rten mgon de la/ /zhus pa bde bar gshegs pas lung bstan pa/ /dge ba'i las kyi 'bras bus yid 'ong zhing / /gang gi bde bas bde bar gshegs pa bskyed/ /sngon gyi srid par spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ /skye bo thams cad bde bas bde ldan byas/ /de yis

legs pa'i las de byas pas na/ /bde ba'i lam gyis mya ngan 'das reg 'gyur/ /ston pa'i gsung gis mdzes pa de dga' nas/ /de yi skad cig sa steng pus btsugs te/ /gzhal med dga' ba'i sems ni dang bas su/ /'jig rten sgron ma 'dren la phyag 'tshal byed/ /

ston pa'i blo yis mkhas la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'gro ba kun las nges 'byung phyag 'tshal lo/ /'jigs med blo dag pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bde gshegs gzhan min gsung la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de nas klu'i rgyal po lha mdzes kyis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad

pa'i dbyangs kyis zhus pa/ 'od mdzad spyan sdug legs pa'i spyan mnga' ba/ /blo dge nyon mongs tshogs las rnam grol zhing / /ye shes dri med spyod yul khyod la ni/ /spyad pa spyod tshe rnam thar bla med zhu/ /lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten sman slad du/ /ji ltar spyad

na byang chub zhi 'tshal zhing / /mi mchog dam pa bdag gi spyod sbyong ba/ /yid 'das de dag bdag la bka' stsal gsol/ /rgyal ba de yis rdul bcom dbang po bsdams/ /'dod pa'i 'ching las thugs ni rnam grol ba'i/ /dgongs pa'i de nyid sems kyi rjes 'jug

pa/ /thugs zhi ma dkrugs des ni lung bstan pa/ /mkhas pas dge ba dag ni spyad pa'i phyir/ /srog gi phyir yang yid ni mi ldog cing / /rtag tu spyod tshe nyon mongs med yid kyis/ /lus dang ngag gis dge ba mnyam spyod pa/ /de yis legs pa'i las de byas pas

na/ /'khor ba'i 'gro la spyod pa rnam dag ste/ /chu yi nang nas pad ma skye ba ltar/ /gos pa med cing byang chub yang dag 'grub/ /bde gshegs gsung gis lha yi mdzes pa klu/ /de ni dga' zhing legs par mgu bas su/ /de yi skad cig sa la pus btsugs te/ /

sangs rgyas rkang gnyis mchog la phyag 'tshal byed/ /thub pa 'jig rten gsum la sman mdzad pa/ /blo gros nges par zhi la phyag 'tshal lo/ /spyad pa spyod tshe khyod kyi rjes slob cing / /byang chub mi g.yo yid ni bskyed par bgyi/ /sems can don du spyad pa spyod pa'i

tshe/ /lus dang srog ni de bzhin btang nas su/ /sdug bsngal thar byed sangs rgyas 'gyur ba dang / /byang chub zhi ba bla med thob par bgyi/ /klu de'i bsam pa thugs su chud nas su/ /rgyal ba dgra las rgyal ba 'dzum mdzad de/ /de tshe ji ltar gang gA'i bye snyed kyi/ /

sangs rgyas mtha' yas zhing ni 'od kyis khyab/ /bde bar gshegs pas 'dzum pa bstan pa la/ /nam mkha'i lhas rig legs so zhes gsol te/ /e ma'o rgyal bas rdul bcom ldan dbang po bsgoms/ /khyod dang mnyam med gong na yod ma yin/ /sangs rgyas

zhing mang dag ni rab g.yos shing / /'dod pa'i lha ni sder bcas shin tu rmongs/ /lha tshogs mang po bsam pa rab dga' zhing / /rgyal ba dbang po thub la phyag 'tshal byed/ /ston pa'i nyan thos rdzu 'phrul che ba'i mchog /maud gal bu yis rgyal la yongs

zhus pa/ /gang gis dpag tu med pa'i 'dzum mdzad pa/ /bcom ldan bde gshegs rgyu gang rkyen gang lags/ /maud gal bu yis rgyal la nyer zhus pa/ /the tsom gcod mdzad rgyal bas bka' stsal pa/ /nga la mchod pa byed pa'i klu 'di ni/ /ma 'ongs pa yi

dus na sangs rgyas 'gyur/ /ji snyed zhing 'di 'od kyis khyab pa dag /de dag thams cad rgyal ba'i zhing gcig 'gyur/ /des na rgyal ba 'di ltar 'gyur ba ste/ /'dren pa de'i ming dbang po rgyal mtshan no/ /srog chags bye ba khrag khrig mtha' yas dag /

des ni 'gro srid pha rol sgrol byed de/ /'di la brten nas ngas ni 'dzum pa bstan/ /maud gal bu khyod de ltar shes par gyis/ /klu de lung bstan pa ni thos nas su/ /bla na med pa dag gi dga' bas khyab/ /lung bstan thos nas bar snang 'di las ni/ /

ta la brgyad cu'i srid du mngon par 'phags/ /phyogs bcu dag na rnam dag rgyal ba'i zhing / /bzang la grangs med sangs rgyas de mthong ste/ /mthong nas sangs rgyas rkang gnyis mchog dag la/ tshigs bcad sna tshogs dag gis rgyal ba bstod/ /'gro ba phan skyed rgyal ba dgra

las rgyal/ /dbang po thul cing ma nor de bzhin gsung / /'od mdzad bden gsung khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bde gshegs tshig rmongs med la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de nas klu'i rgyal po rgya mtshos bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis zhu ba zhus pa/ 'jigs sel

sngags grol khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /spyad pa spyod tshe sug las ci bgyis pas/ /'jigs las grol dang 'gro ba thar bgyid pa/ /'jigs sel lam zhugs bdag la bka' stsal gsol/ /ji ltar 'dren pa bdag nyid 'jigs grol zhing / /skye bo 'jigs las rab tu grol mdzad

pa/ /khyod kyis legs par gsungs pa'i bka' thos nas/ /de bzhin ngoms med yid kyis spyad par bgyi/ /chu chen 'dzin pa klu yi rgya mtsho des/ /'gro la phan phyir ston la zhu byed pa/ /'jigs bcas zhe sar bcas shing de brten nas/ /mi dbang spyan sngar zhes bcas pas 'dug /

de yi bsam pa 'dren pas thugs chud nas/ /ji ltar spyad na 'jigs dang rnam bral zhing / /sems can dag kyang 'jigs las thar byed pa/ /yan lag brgyad ldan gsung gis lung bstan to/ /byang chub spyad pa rjes su spyod bya zhing / /dbyug mtshon med pas 'gro la rab tu ston/ /

chu dang thang dang de bzhin g.yul 'thab pa'i/ /'jigs la yang dang yang du 'jigs med sbyin/ /de yis legs pa'i las ni byas pas na/ /'jigs par mi 'gro byang chub reg 'gyur la/ /mnyam par bzhag pa'i byams pa'i sems kyis su/ /shin tu mi bzad bdud stobs

rab skrag byed/ /stobs bcu'i mkhyen pas rgya mtsho de dga' nas/ /de yi skad cig sa la pus btsugs te/ /'jigs par mi gnas zhi bar rab 'dug nas/ /bde bar gshegs la thal sbyar phyag 'tshal byed/ /srid kun bdag la mi gnas phyag 'tshal lo/ /dngang med 'jigs

bral ldan la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dngang dang 'jigs las skye bo bsgral bgyi zhing / /de bzhin gshegs pa mi dngang bdag 'gyur bgyi/ /de nas klu'i rgyal po gser gtsug gis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis zhu ba zhus pa/ drang srong chen po spyan dge dbang po

thul/ /srid pa'i rgya mtsho rgal cing pha rol phyin/ /skam la bzhugs pa sred bskams gang zag mchog /'gro ba'i don phyir khyod zhu bka' stsal gsol/ /ji ltar spyad na bde gshegs bdag skye zhing / /rgyal ba'i bstan la rab tu gnas gyur dang / /bdud phrag stong dag

gis kyang mi bskyod pa/ /kun spyad 'di dag bdag la bka' stsal gsol/ /sangs rgyas tshul la mi g.yo rab gnas shing / /klu yi gtso bos 'dren la de zhus pa/ /klu yi bdag po bsam pa thugs chud nas/ /nyon mongs kun spangs de ni lung bstan pa/ /lhag

pa'i bsam pas chos kyi nges ldan zhing / /nges pa stong pa'i yul la rab tu gnas/ /srid las rnam rgyal bstan la mi g.yo zhing / /gzhal med byang chub la ni 'dun pa bskyed/ /gser gtsug rdzu 'phrul che ba'i klu de ni/ /sangs rgyas gsungs pa thos nas the tsom

med/ /byang chub phyir ni mi g.yo yid bskyed cing / /'jigs kun pha rol phyin la mngon par bstod/ /srid mtsho rgal cing skam la shin tu bzhugs/ /the tsom mi mnga' mi g.yo brtan brnyes shing / /srid par 'khor brtan bzhin du rab bzhugs pa/ /ri rab ri la lha yi

gnas bcas bzhin/ /'di ltar mi g.yo ba la skyabs mchi zhing / /mi g.yo ri lta bur ni 'gyur bar bgyi/ /de'i tshe 'gul dang mi 'gul zhing mi gnas/ /mi g.yo ri rab lta bur 'gyur bar bgyi/ /ma smad pas ni de yi thugs chud nas/ /yid du 'ong ba'i dbyangs kyis lung bstan

pa/ /bskal pa stong phrag brgyad cur spyad byas nas/ /ma 'ongs pa yis dus su sangs rgyas 'gyur/ /bde ba'i lam gyis rgyal bar 'gyur ba ste/ /mtshan ni legs mthong zhes bya shin tu sdug /srog chags bye ba stong phrag thar byed cing / /bsil ba bde ba zhi

ba'i lam 'god 'gyur/ /rgyal bas gsungs pa klu des thos nas su/ /gzhal med dga' ba'i sems ni rab dang bas/ /nyon mongs thams cad sel cing ma smad pa/ /'gro ba'i 'dren pa la ni phyag 'tshal byed/ /de nas klu'i rgyal po ud pa la mig gis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs

su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis zhu ba zhus pa/ mi mchog 'dul mdzad gzi brjid mtha' yas pa/ /thugs rab zhi zhing nyer zhi pha rol gshegs/ /zhi gnas yon tan rab zhi rnam grol ba/ /zhi ba mkhas pa bde bar gshegs pa gsung / /khyod sras byang chub ji ltar spyad bgyis

na/ /zhi gnas dga' zhing zhi gnas bsten pa dang / /zhi gnas la ni ji ltar mkhas par 'gyur/ /kun gzigs myur du bdag gi som nyi khum/ /rgyal ba la ni klu des zhus pa dang / /rgyal bas ud pa la mig la lung bstan pa/ /gang gis dge ba'i las kyis yid 'ong

ba'i/ /zhi gnas la ni shin tu bslabs par 'gyur/ /de phyir byang chub sems dpa' mkhas pa ni/ /spyad pa spyod tshe sems g.yor mi byed cing / bskal pa bye bar zhi gnas bsten byas pa/ /byang chub dam pa dpa' mchog sangs rgyas 'gyur/ /de yid rab zhi byang chub

rtogs nas su/ /rnam 'dren 'gro ba zhi la sbyor byed cing / /rab tu sems zhi g.yo bar mi 'gyur la/ /sems can nyon mongs mi g.yo zhi bar byed/ /des pa ud pa la mig gi klu des ni/ /rgyal bas legs par gsungs pa'i tshig thos nas/ /nyon mongs kun g.yo

yid ni zhi gyur te/ /byang chub mchog rab sems ni bskyed gyur to/ /de yi zhi gnas sems la brten nas su/ /byang chub sems bskyed rgyal ba de la bstod/ /khyod la bskyed nas zhi gnas rtogs gyur cing / /shin tu yid zhi sangs rgyas 'gyur bar bgyi/ /de nas klu'i rgyal

po dga' bos bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis zhu ba zhus pa/ bde bar gshegs pa zhi gnas thugs su chud/ /rgyal ba gang zag mchog la bdag zhu ba/ /khyod nyid las 'khrungs byang chub rab gnas pa/ /mi mchog ji ltar lhag mthong dag la

spyad/ /mi 'dul kha lo sgyur la dga' bos zhus/ /klu de'i sngon gyi mtha' ni gzigs pas na/ /dge ba'i las bsags pa dag thugs chud nas/ /mi 'dul kha lo sgyur ba 'di skad gsung / /ye shes dam pa byang chub mchog btsal phyir/ /ma zhum yid kyis nor dang 'bru

dag la/ /ser sna med cing rdzas mang mi nyung dang / /chung ma dang ni bdag nyid gtong bar byed/ /de yis legs pa'i las de byas pa dang / /gtong ba shin tu sdug bsngal bsten pas na/ /ye shes dam pa bdag rgyal sangs rgyas 'gyur/ /de ni lhag mthong spyad pa'i 'bras bu yin/ /

de nas klu'i rgyal po nye bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis zhu ba zhus pa/ 'gro ba kun gyi 'dren la bdag zhu ba/ /khyod sras byang chub ji ltar spyad bgyis na/ /zhi gnas lhag mthong mnyam par spyod pa dang / /zang zing med zhi byang chub 'thob 'gyur lags/ /'dren

pa de la klu des zhus pa dang / /zhi gnas lhag mthong yang dag len mkhyen pa/ /thogs pa med pa 'dren pa 'di brnyes pas/ /de ni bde bar gshegs pa'i bstan la bzhag /byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig spyad spyod tshe/ /gnyis ka'i stobs 'di mnyam par bsten pas na/ /

de ni bye ba khrag khrig mtha' yas zhing / /'gro ba'i don du mnyam par rnam par sbyong / /bskal pa bye ba mang po de 'tshang rgya/ /zhing gi dam pa dag kyang 'god 'gyur te/ /de'i mtha' bsngags pa bskal pa bye mang du/ /sangs rgyas bye bas zad par de mi spyod/ /de tshe klu yi bdag

po nye dga' yis/ /theg pa mnyam pa'i bsngags pa thos nas su/ /gzhal du med pa'i dga' bas sems bde nas/ /byang chub mchog gi sems rab bskyed gyur to/ /'jig rten phan phyir byang chub de lung bstan/ /ma 'ongs dus su sangs rgyas 'gyur ba ste/ /ming ni rgyal ba

'dren pa kun spyan no/ /srog chags bye ba stong phrag thar bar byed/ /de nas klu'i rgyal po ma dros pas bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis zhu ba zhus pa/ bde gshegs khyod sras ji ltar spyad bgyis na/ /'gro ba'i don du phan pa tshol byed cing / /

byang chub bla ma tshol la mi skyo ba/ /rkang gnyis dam pa mchog gis de lung ston/ /mi yi khyu mchog la ni klus zhus pa/ /klu yi bdag po'i bsam pa thugs chud de/ /thub pa sngon mtha' sbyor la mi 'jigs pas/ /klu yi bdag po'i the tshom lung bstan pa/ /byang chub

zhi ba spyad pa spyod 'dod pa/ /des shing nyams pa med par spyod pa dang / /bdag dang gzhan dag la yang mi gnod cing / /ser sna med cing gtong ldan rgyal ba yin/ /de yis legs pa'i las de byas pas na/ /'gro ba gang gi 'khor bar bde 'dod la/ /des shing

thams cad du ni snying rjer ldan/ /nor byin pas ni sdud pa byed par 'gyur/ /de yis legs pa'i las de byas pas na/ /nam du'ang skye ba'i sdug bsngal myong mi 'gyur/ /rtag tu bde bas skye bo bder 'god la/ /kha na ma tho med cing gnas zhir 'jog /ston pa'i gsung

gis klu de bskul bas na/ /mchog tu dga' bas sems ni bder 'gyur te/ /de yis skad cig sa la pus btsugs nas/ /tshigs bcad sna tshogs dag gis rgyal bstod pa/ /gau tam 'jig rten kun na mnyam med de/ /'gro ba zil mnan bde gshegs lhang nge ba/ /khyod

kyi zhal du lhar bcas 'gro kun blta/ /'di ltar thal mo sbyar nas skyabs su mchi/ /byang chub mchog gi yid ni bskyed bgyi zhing / /'di ltar bde gshegs khyod kyi ye shes dang / /ston pa khyod kyis the tsom bsal ba ltar/ /bdag kyang thos nas 'jig rten the tsom bsal/ /de

nas de'i ston gzhal med byang chub phyir/ /yid ni shin tu dgyes nas bka' stsal pa/ /'jig rten phan phyir 'dren par 'gyur ba yi/ /mi mchog ming ni dbang po chen po'o/ /de nas klu'i rgyal po e ra pa nas bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis zhu ba zhus pa/ 'jig rten

dpag med mang po'i skyabs kyi mchog /rgyal ba the tshom gcod la zhu bgyi ba/ /byang chub sems dpas sug las ci bgyis na/ /sangs rgyas mngon du lhan cig phrad pa 'thob/ /'jig rten mgon po de la klus zhus nas/ /'jig rten phan phyir 'dren pas lung bstan pa/ /sems can

rgyud la nyon mongs rnam rig dang / /yongs su dul ba'i yid ni rnam shes nas/ /'gro la phan phyir snying rje bskyed nas su/ /byang chub mchog gi don du spyad pa spyod/ /bdag dang rgyal bar ji ltar phrad snyam nas/ /thabs la mkhas par mngon par rab gnas te/ /rgyal ba rnams

dang bde gshegs mya ngan 'das/ /sku gdung dag la gzhal med mchod byed cing / /rnam grol yid kyis smon lam 'debs par byed/ /de yis legs pa'i las de byas pas na/ /rtag tu sangs rgyas mngon par phrad 'thob ste/ /rgyal ba mngon sum mchod pa byas nas su/ /byang

chub dga' ba 'od ldan reg par 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas kyis ni legs gsungs tshig thos nas/ /e ra ba na klu ni yid mgu ste/ /gzhal du med pa'i dga' bas sems bde nas/ /dad pa'i yid kyis sangs rgyas mngon bstod pa/ /mi 'dul kha lo sgyur la phyag 'tshal lo/ /khyod kyis

bdag gi som nyi the tshom bsal/ /byang chub don du yid 'di bskyed bgyi ste/ /sdug bsngal mthar bgyid sangs rgyas 'gyur bar bgyi/ /gang zag bdag gis klu yi bdag po yi/ /bsam pa thugs chud byang chub lung bstan pa/ /bskal pa bye ba brgyad cu rtsa bzhi ru/ /spyad pa spyod

nas de nas sangs rgyas 'gyur/ /mi mchog mtshan ni thams cad sgrol ba ste/ /srog chags bye ba stong phrag thar bar byed/ /de yi ring bsrel mang por 'gyur ba ste/ /skye bo mang po mtho ris 'gro bar 'gyur/ /klu de ston pa'i gsung gis dga' gyur nas/ /'jig rten phan mdzad

rnam 'dren mngon bstod pa/ /khyod kyis 'gro ba'i don ni rgya cher mdzad/ /sdug bsngal mthar mdzad sangs rgyas phyag 'tshal lo// //bam po bcu gnyis pa/ de nas klu'i rgyal po tshib pa'i bus bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis zhu ba zhus

pa/ lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten don slad du/ /'jig rten don mdzad rnam 'dren la zhu ba/ /spyad pa spyod tshe sug las ci bgyis pas/ /ma rtogs rtogs nas rgyal ba rnam 'dren 'gyur/ /tshib pa'i bu des rgyal la mngon zhus nas/ /nyon mongs thams cad

bsal bas lung bstan pa/ /dge ba'i las kyis 'bras bu yid 'ong zhing / /nyon mongs bcom pas des na rgyal zhes bya/ /de ni 'gro kun tshe dang sangs rgyas la/ /mchog tu dang ba dag gis sems kyang shes/ /de yis las kyi lam de byas pas na/ /'gro ba'i rtag pa rgyal ba dag tu

'gyur/ /de yis rgyal ba'i bshad pa thos nas su/ /'gro ba thams cad la ni dad par byas/ /de tshe de yis dge ba byas pas na/ /'di yi smon lam btab ltar bdag 'gyur ro/ /de nas 'jig rten mgon pos de lung bstan/ /mi mchog sangs rgyas su ni 'gyur ba ste/ /srog

chags bye ba stong phrag thar byed cing / /spyad pa spyod tshe rgyal ba mngon par bstod/ /ston pa'i gsung gis klu de dga' gyur nas/ /sangs rgyas la ni dad bskyed mngon bstod pa/ /'gro ba thar mdzad sangs rgyas phyag 'tshal lo/ /bsam yas bde gshegs khyod la phyag 'tshal

lo/ /de nas klu'i rgyal po nag pos bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis zhu ba zhus pa/ drang srong chen po skyabs mchog dpag tu med/ /skyon dang bral zhing yon tan mchog brnyes pa/ /stobs bcu'i 'jigs pas rnam gnon khyod la ni/ /byang chub zhi spyod mkhas

pa rab gnas zhu/ /des pa'i nyon mongs ji ltar bsal ba dang / /rgyal ba'i mchog nyid ji ltar bsgom par bgyi/ /bdud kyi spyod yul de dag ji ltar spang / /sangs rgyas spyod yul dag la ji ltar spyad/ /rgyal ba la ni klu des zhus pa dang / /ji ltar bde gshegs spyod yul

spyad pa dang / /ji ltar bdud kyi spyod yul spang ba dag /lam gnyis shin tu mkhyen pas rab tu bstan/ /ston pa la ni klu bdag des zhus nas/ /de yi bsam pa thugs chud lung bstan pa/ /mi mkhas gang dag sems can 'du shes spyod/ /de dag nag po'i rtsa lag spyod

yul spyod/ /gang dag sems can med cing yid mi gnas/ /de dag thams cad gzigs pa'i spyod yul spyod/ /nag po'i rtsa lag dag las rgyal nas su/ /byang chub bla med zhi ba des thob bo/ /ston pa'i gsung gis klu de dga' gyur nas/ /bdud kyi spyod yul myur bar rnam

spangs te/ /sangs rgyas thams cad gzigs ltar spyod yul dag /bsten pas de ni myur du rgyal bar 'gyur/ /de nas klu'i rgyal po gau ta mas bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis zhu ba zhus pa/ kha lo sgyur mchog khyod la zhu bgyi ba/ /'dren pa khyod sras ji ltar

spyad bgyis nas/ /klu yi skye gnas dag ni gcod bgyid cing / /sangs rgyas tshul gyi myu gu bskyed par bgyid/ /bde bar gshegs la klu des zhus pa dang / /de yi bsam pa thugs chud lung bstan pa/ /sems can med la rgyal ba'i sras spyod cing / /byang chub sems la

nams kyang de mi gnas/ /de ni stong nyid khong du chud pa yin/ /mkhas pa mtshan ma smon lam rnam spangs shing / /mdzangs pa mi dmigs pa la gnas pa dag /'di ni sangs rgyas chos mngon myu gu bskyed/ /ston pa'i gsung gis klu de dga' gyur nas/ /mi dmigs pa la

brten par rab gnas shing / /bdud kyi zhags bcings dam pa bcad nas su/ /sangs rgyas tshul la klu ni rab tu gnas/ /'jig rten mkhas pas byang chub de lung bstan/ /ma 'ongs dus su sangs rgyas 'gyur ba ste/ /rnam thar rgyal zhes phyogs su rnam grags shing / /

bdud kyi dbang song srog chags thar bar byed/ /ston pa'i gsung gis klu de dga' gyur nas/ /thal mo sbyar nas sangs rgyas phyag 'tshal byed/ /khyod kyi lam bstan pas na sangs rgyas bsten/ /mi mchog thar mdzad zhing la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de nas klu'i rgyal po kam

pa la'i sgras bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis zhu ba zhus pa/ zla ba'i 'od ltar dri med mthu che zhing / /mi mchog rang byung gyur la zhu bgyi ba/ /rnam 'dren sras ni ji ltar spyad bgyis na/ /phan par 'jug cing rjes su skye bar 'gyur/ /gal te stong

nyid smon med rjes song zhing / /phung po mtshan ma mi ldan bral ba dang / /nam mkha' 'dra ba'i chos dang rnam shes na/ /pha yi lam du bu yang rjes 'gro 'gyur/ /ston pas legs par gsungs pa de dga' nas/ /dmigs su med pa yi ni sems bskyed

do/ /'jig rten mkhas pas byang chub de lung bstan/ /rjes su 'thun 'di spyod pa spyad byas shing / /zhing mchog dag kyang yongs su sbyangs nas su/ /ma 'ongs dus su sangs rgyas 'gyur ba ste/ /zla bas lhag par phyogs su rnam grags shing / /srid par 'gro ba'i sems

can thar bar byed/ /kam pa la zhes ming btags klu de ni/ /shAkya sras mkhas byang chub lung bstan nas/ /sems ni dga' zhing yongs su yid mgu ste/ /'gro kun thar bar mdzad la mngon bstod pa/ /thub pa che la 'di ltar skyabs su mchi/ /sangs rgyas 'gyur bar the

tshom bdag ma mchis/ /mun pa dag la sgron ma gzung bgyi zhing / /long ba mig ma mchis la lam bstan bgyi/ /de nas klu'i bdag po yul 'khor srung gis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis zhu ba zhus pa/ mgon po 'jig rten long bar gyur pa'i mig /mig

sbyin sman pa drang srong che la zhu/ /gang gis 'jig rten rnam thar lam bzang zhing / /zhi ba'i sar mchis rkang gnyis dbang po gsungs/ /stobs bcu'i stobs mnga' rnam par thar ba'i lam ston pa/ /'jig rten mgon po rkang gnyis dbang pos de lung bstan/ /gang gis yun ring zhugs

pa'i sdug bsngal lam zhi zhing / /'khor ba nyer zhi mya ngan 'das pa gsal bar 'gro/ /ston la klu yi rgyal po lam zhi thos nas su/ /sdug bsngal ba la snying rje dam pa bskyed byas shing / /klu yi rgyal pos byang chub 'dun pa drag bskyed de/ /stobs bcu'i stobs 'chang

'jig rten mgon du bdag 'gyur byed/ /stobs bcu'i yon tan mnga' bas klu dbang lung bstan pa/ /mi yi seng ge bdag nyid mu stegs dgrar 'gyur zhing / /sems can mtha' yas dpag med 'khor bar 'gro ba dag /bde gshegs mchog gi tshig gis 'dren cing thar bar

byed/ /ston pa'i gsung mchog klu yi rgyal pos thos nas su/ /dga' ba'i sems kyis sor bcu'i rtse mo thal sbyar te/ /mi dbang 'jig rten mgon po drang srong chen po la/ /gus pa bskyed nas 'khrul med tshig gis mngon bstod pa/ /skyabs mchog shin tu thugs gzhungs mtshungs

med ye shes tog /'gro ba'i dge ba spyod cing dge la yun ring dang / /'gro ba'i bsam pa mtha' yas khyod kyis thugs chud pas/ /des na mi dbang khyod ni 'jig rten rgya cher grags/ /de nas klu'i rgyal po gser mgrin gyis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis zhu ba

zhus pa/ stobs bcu'i stobs mnga' stobs che stobs dang ldan pa ste/ /thugs dge snang mdzad 'od dang ldan zhing sdig mi mnga'/ /srid rgyal blo gros bzang bas 'gro ba shin tu mkhyen/ /rgyal ba dge spyod shin tu dri med zhal gsungs shig /mi mchog rdul bral khyod sras ji ltar

spyad bgyis na/ /mkhas pa ma dkrugs ma bskyod pa dag thugs chud cing / /rgyal ba rdul bral dpag med brgya ni yongs su mkhyen/ /rgyal sras skye bo phan mdzad thugs su chud pa'i spyan/ /blo gros dpag med mnga' ba lha mi mkhas pa yis/ /bla mar bgyis shing rgyal ba

dpag med sa yas bskor/ /mkhas pa dus su 'gro ba dpag med phan mdzad dgongs/ /stobs bcu mnga' ba klu yi 'gro ba zhus pa gsungs/ /blo 'chal bral zhing blo gtsang rjes dgongs brtag pa mdzod/ /nga yi sras mchog rgyal bsten rga shi zad byed pa/ /'thob cing

rgyal bas mchod cing rdul med skyon bral re/ /'gro ba'i sdug bsngal dpag med brgya shes yongs su 'gro la/ /stobs bcu blo gros mnga' bas klu yi bdag po yis/ /rga shi zad bya thos nas rab tu yid dga' ste/ /'gro la phan yid byang chub yid byas rgyal ba'i mchog /

rnam 'dren blo mnga' 'gro la phan mdzad mngon bstod pa/ /'gro ba mang po'i mun pa rab rib ling tog dag /gcod mdzad 'gro 'di'i sdug bsngal 'joms shing mun pa dang / /rab rib ling tog kun nas sel mdzad bdud rtsi'i lam/ /shin tu dri med spyan mnga'

dge ba phyogs bcur ston/ /klu yi bdag po'i gser dngul lta bu'i khyim gshegs shing / /yon tan dpag med mnga' ba shin tu thugs su chud/ /blo gros ston mdzad 'od zer stong 'dra'i spyan mnga' zhal/ /ma 'khrul ma glongs ma smad gzi che

mkhas pa'i gzi/ /stobs bcu 'od chen mnga' la 'gro ba'i tshig gis bstod/ /rgyal mchog bdag nyid bde ldan sangs rgyas byang chub nas/ /'gro ba 'khyams shing mngon med rga shi sdug bsngal gyis/ /nyam thag sdug bsngal dpag med bsal te thar bar bgyi/ /bde dang zhi

dang zhi ba rdul med rgya che sel/ /zhi ba'i lam du zhugs nas bdag ni sangs rgyas bgyi/ /rgyal ba brgya yis thugs chud bdud kyi stobs dag ni/ /stobs med bgyi zhing mi mkhas pa dag gzhug par bgyi/ /de nas klu'i rgyal po mgrin sngon gyis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad

pa'i dbyangs kyis zhu ba zhus pa/ ston mchog mi 'dul kha lo sgyur la zhu bgyi ba/ /'dren pa khyod kyi sras ni ji ltar spyad bgyis na/ /kha na ma tho med cing zhi la rdul bral dang / /nyon mongs med cing byang chub dam pa sangs rgyas 'gyur/ /'gro ba'i don du 'dren pas gsungs pa gang / /

dpa' bo khyod nyid las 'khrungs sras thos nas/ /kha na ma tho med cing bdag dang gzhan/ /sangs rgyas 'gyur dang byang chub the tshom khum/ /mgrin sngon klu de yis ni zhus pa dang / /'jig rten kun la chags pa med pa'i thugs/ /chos rnams kun la mi 'jigs dbang brnyes shing / /

ston pa'i gsung la legs gnas lung bstan pa/ /nga sras 'jig rten gsum la ma chags shing / /'gro la phan par spyad pa spyod byed pa/ /'dod pa'i khams dang gzugs kyi khams dag dang / /gzugs med khams su'ang ched du mi skye'o/ /mya ngan 'das dbyings gzhal

med 'dus ma byas/ /thams cad kyi ni sdug bsngal zad cing 'gog /de ni nyer bzung 'jig rten gos med yin/ /rgyal ba rgyal ba'i dbang po rab tu bsgom/ /de yis legs pa'i las de byas pas na/ /gos pa med cing 'jigs med rnam spyod la/ /bdag dang gzhan

la gnod pa med gnas te/ /bdag nyid bla med byang chub mngon 'tshang rgya/ /de ni rnam smin de las rjes 'thun pa/ /shin tu dka' bas byang chub 'tshang rgyar 'gyur/ /de yi skye bo srog chags lha dang klu/ /mi dang srin po dag gis mi mthong ngo / /klu mgrin sngon po

stobs po che de ni/ /sangs rgyas kun mkhyen gsung gis dga' gyur nas/ /sor mo bcu yi thal sbyar mgo btud de/ /'jig rten sgron mdzad 'dren la phyag 'tshal byed/ /mi mchog la ni 'di ltar bdag skyabs mchi/ /yab kyi rjes su sras kyang mchi bgyi zhing / /mthar

bgyid bcom la byang chub 'tshang rgyar bgyi/ /sems can sdug bsngal chos kyis gnod gyur dgrol/ /'jig rten mkhas pas byang chub de lung bstan/ /khyod ni ma 'ongs dus su 'tshang rgya ste/ /kun tu spyan zhes phyogs su rnam grags shing / /'gro ba'i srid las sems can grol

bar byed/ /de nas klu'i rgyal po 'jigs sgrogs kyis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis zhu ba zhus pa/ mi 'dul kha lo sgyur ba yid las 'das/ /ston pa sug las ci bgyis bdag zhu'o/ /rgyal ba de ni snam phyogs gzigs pa na/ /dkyil 'khor

tsam gyis ni mdun du 'gyur/ /chos la nges pa'i rgyal bas de lung bstan/ /kun mkhyen mkhyen pas bsam pa thugs chud nas/ /bla na med pa'i thugs ni bskyed mdzad de/ /de bzhin mi mchog gis ni 'di lung bstan/ /bde ba 'byung ba dag gi las byas shing / /de dag

sngan chad yang dang yang dran pas/ /de yi rnam smin las ni 'di ltar shes/ /de yi gzigs pa ras ni 'gyur ba yin/ /rgyal bas legs gsungs tshig ni thos nas su/ /klu rgyal de ni mchog tu dga' gyur nas/ /'phags pa'i zang zing med pa'i dga' bskyed de/ /nga rgyal

bcom nas sangs rgyas phyag 'tshal byed/ /de nas klu'i rgyal po gzi can gyis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis zhu ba zhus pa/ lam stor ba la lam ni rab ston cing / /'jig rten don mdzad 'dren la zhu bgyi ba/ /sngon tshe rtag tu phrin las ci mdzad na/ /ji

ltar dgongs pa bzhin du zhi gnas mdzad/ /'jig rten mgon po rgyal bas de lung bstan/ /sems can klu ni gdul ba'i dus bab cing / /'gro ba thams cad la ni phan pa'i phyir/ /'dren pa bdud stobs 'joms pas lung bstan pa/ /'das pa'i dus su

spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ /tshul bzhin ma yin sems dang gnyen min pa'i/ /nams kyang mi sems rtag tu zhi gnas bsten/ /de la ngas ni yun ring bslabs pa yin/ /de bzhin rgyal ba dag gi mchod rten la/ /phreng ba rin chen dag ni bkram zhing phul/ /de yis legs

pa'i las de byas pas na/ /nyon mongs sems dang nams kyang mi gnas so/ /nga yis bskal pa stong phrag bye ba ru/ /gzhan la gnod pas nams kyang gnod ma byas/ /nga ni de yis las kyi rnam smin rgyus/ /ji ltar bsams bzhin zhi gnas sten par byed/ /drang srong che

bas lung bstan 'di thos nas/ /gzi can klu ni dga' bar gyur pa na/ /gzhal du med pa'i bde bas sems dga' nas/ /ston pa'i mdun 'dug tshigs su bcad pas bstod/ /'gro ba'i kun ldang nyon mongs zhi mdzad cing / /de dag sems zhi khyod kyi bstan pa mdzad/ /

thub pa nyon mongs med par 'jig rten spyod/ /zla 'od lta bur blo zhi phyag 'tshal lo/ /de nas klu'i rgyal po rnam par snang byed kyis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis zhu ba zhus pa/ sngon tshe dag tu phrin las ci mdzad na/ /thub pa khyod kyis sku la rdul mi gos/ /dpe

med rnams gnon 'di dag bdag la gsungs/ /gang dag thos nas dge ba'i las spyad bgyi/ /rnam par snang byed dge ba tshol ba'i klus/ /'jig rten mgon de la ni zhus pa dang / /nyon mongs kun sel yan lag brgyad ldan zhing / /snyan cing 'jebs pa'i sgras ni lung bstan pa/ /

nga yis sngon chad byang chub tshol ba na/ /nams kyang tshul bzhin ma yin ngas ma bsams/ /nams kyang rab tu nyes sems ngas ma bskyed/ /bla med byams las yang dang yang du byas/ /nga yis dge ba'i las de byas pas na/ /bla med byang chub zhi ba reg nas su/ /mi mchog

rgyal ba thub pa'i sku dag dang / /na bza' la yang rdul gyis mi gos so/ /rgyal ba'i phrin las dge bsags de thos nas/ /rnam par snang byed klu ni yid dga' ste/ /sor bcu'i thal mo sbyar nas mgo bo yis/ /rgyal ba'i zhabs la mngon par phyag 'tshal byed/ /legs so rgyal

ba mu byed sngon du gshegs/ /khyod kyis rgya che mtha' yas don dag mdzad/ /srid pa'i tshogs la dga' zhing sdug bsngal gyis/ /gdungs pa'i 'gro ba mtha' dag khyod kyis bkrol/ /skye bo dug gdug rig pa'i sman pa ste/ /skye bo dug bcom khyod ni gso sman lags/ /me

'bar zhi ltar rim gyis mya ngan 'da'/ /'di ltar thal sbyar mgos btud skyabs su mchi/ /de nas klu'i rgyal po bsgyings pas bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis zhu ba zhus pa/ /rnam 'dren dge ba'i phrin las ci mdzad na/ /zhabs ni shin tu mnyam zhing

brtan pa brnyes/ /gang dag thos nas shin tu yid dga' 'thob/ /mi yi mchog gyur de dag bdag la gsungs/ /klu yi rgyal po bsgyings pas rnam par 'dren/ /'jig rten mkhas la de yis zhus pa dang / /yid du 'ong ba'i tshigs bcad sna tshogs kyis/ /klu

yi rgyal po yid ni dga' bar gyur/ /nga yis tshul khrims brtul zhugs rnam dag bsgrubs/ /nga yis gzhan yang tshul khrims brtul zhugs bsgoms/ ngas ni dge ba'i las de byas pas na/ /rkang pa mnyam pa dag gis sa la reg /de tshe thams cad mkhyen pas lung

bstan pa/ /rdul bral klu ni yid dga' mgu gyur nas/ /gzhal du med pa'i bde bas sems dga' ste/ /sangs rgyas rkang gnyis mchog la phyag 'tshal byed/ /legs so rgyal ba 'od mdzad rdul bcom zhing / /shin tu nyon mongs bag chags bcas pa bcom/ /zla nya'i dkyil

'khor sgra gcan gyis btang ltar/ /dgra bcom nas ni phyogs rnams rab tu gsal/ /de nas klu'i rgyal po 'od chen gyis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis zhu ba zhus pa/ lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten sman slad du/ /'jig rten 'das gsung 'dren la zhu bgyi

ba/ /rkang gnyis dam pa sug las ci bgyis na/ /rnam 'dren gnas ma lags pa 'tshal ba 'thob/ /sngon tshe dag tu spyad pa spyod pa na/ /lus dang ngag yid dang ni sems kyis kyang / /bde ba 'byung ba'i yang dag las byas te/ /las gang byas pas

nams kyang gdung mi 'gyur/ /rab tu dga' zhing dge bas brlan pa dang / /gnas ma yin pa'i lam gyod thams cad ni/ /dge bcu las kyi lam gyis rnam par sbyangs/ /gnas ma yin pa'i nyon mongs thams cad bcom/ /rnam 'dren de yis las de mdzad pas na/ /'di nas

'phos nas gzhan 'phrul dag tu gshegs/ /mi yi 'jig rten brnyes nas der 'das te/ /bla med gnas ma yin pa shes pa 'thob/ /gnas ma yin pa shes la nams kyang ni/ /bye ba khrag khrig bdud kyis bskyod mi nus/ /sems dang de bzhin nyon mongs yid grol te/ /

de bzhin gshegs pas 'gro kun rab tu mkhyen/ /ston pas lung bstan pas ni 'od chen klu/ /yid ni mgu zhing shin tu dga' 'gyur te/ /gzhal du med pa'i bde bas sems dga' nas/ /yon tan pha rol gshegs la phyag 'tshal byed/ /shin tu thugs dul yid

gnyis 'joms pa po/ /'dam las rgal cing skams la shin tu bzhugs/ /thub chen rgal cing 'gro ba sgrol mdzad pa/ /ji ltar nyi mas mun pa bsal nas su/ /gzugs kyi rnam pa snang zhing gsal ba ltar/ /de bzhin ston pa'i thugs ni rnam grol zhing / /sems can

sdug bsngal mang gnod mthar mdzad pa/ /mig sbyin gso ba'i dpyad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de nas klu'i rgyal po rab tu gdung byed kyis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis zhu ba zhus pa/ rgyal ba gser mdog phrin las ci mdzad na/ /dus gsum mkhyen

la rab tu brtan par bzhugs/ /nam mkha' lta bur mkhyen ldan zhu bgyis pa/ /'gro ba'i 'dren pas de dag bdag la gsungs/ /thogs med mkhyen pas thugs ni ma chags shing / /som nyi gcod la the tsom sel mdzad pa/ /rgyal ba rang byung thugs kyis de'i bsam

pa/ /shin tu thugs chud de ni lung bstan pa/ /rtag tu dge ba dran ldan sten byed cing / /nges pa'i las byas pas ni bde 'byung dang / /rtag tu gzhan yang shes la 'jog byed cing / /bdag nyid ji tsam shes pa ser sna med/ /mkhas pa de yis las de byas pas na/ /

lus zhig nas ni gzhan 'phrul dag tu 'gro/ /'dod pa dag na spyod pa'i lha gnas dang / /thur du 'bab cing mi yi bar du 'byung / /dus gsum shes la rnam par rtse byed cing / /bdag dang de bzhin gzhan yang shes par byed/ /pags pa srab cing blo dang ldan gyur pa/ /bde

gshegs thogs pa med pas lung bstan to/ /shin tu blo ldan mchog gis bstan thos nas/ /klu chen rab tu gdung byed dga' gyur te/ /byang chub gzhal du med la rab gnas shing / /yang dag bsngags pas mi mchog rgyal ba bstod/ /dus gsum mtshan nyid gcig tu

gzigs mdzad cing / /las dang rnam smin de bzhin rab tu mkhyen/ /sems can dag gi khyad par bde ba mkhyen/ /bde gshegs thams cad gtong la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de nas klu'i rgyal po stobs chen gyis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis zhu ba zhus pa/ /

mi mchog mchog rab mkhyen rab mtha' yas pa/ /mgon po rdul bral thugs ni yongs su dag /bdag gi som nyi myur sol the tsom yang / /skyen par dgum phyir bde bar gshegs pas gsungs/ /ji ltar sngon tshe mi dang lha dag gis/ /sug las bgyis pa blo mkhas ji

ltar 'tshal/ /ji ltar bla med byang chub mchog thob pa/ /bdag gis the tsom zhus pa myur bar gsungs/ /stobs bcu'i stobs mkhyen bdag nyid shin tu nges/ /rgyal la klu yis zhus pa myur gsung ste/ /nga yis ji ltar mi yi spyod kun dang / /dge ba'i bsam pas byang chub tshol

byed cing / /ji ltar yid rab dga' bas bsgrubs pa dang / /ji ltar skye dgu sdug bsngal gyis gnod cing / /tha ma mthong la ngan 'gror ltung ba dang / /nyon mongs brgya yis mun par gyur pa shes/ /der ni sems can snying pos snying rje bskyed/ /nga yis sems can 'di dag sdug

bsngal dgrol/ /thar bar 'gyur ba'i lam mchog dag tu bzhag /nga yis ngan 'gro dag gi lam ngan dgag /nga yis lam mchog zhi ba rab tu bstan/ /bde ba'i lam gyis byang chub zhi bar bkur/ /stobs bcu'i lam mchog rab tu bstan bya zhing / /

yun ring mi dag gis ni don 'gyur bya/ /de ltar brtan pa des ni snying rje bskyed/ /drang srong chen pos dge tshul bsgrubs nas su/ /mgo dang mig dang de bzhin sha dag ni/ /btang nas bde gshegs lam nas dpa' bo 'gro/ /sngon gyi dus su mi yis spyad pa ni/ /de tshe

rmi lam lta bur rab tu mkhyen/ /dge ba 'di dag mi yis shes pa na/ /stobs bcu mnga' la mchod pa rtsol bar byed/ /mgon la gzhal med de bzhin dad bskyed nas/ /ji ltar 'gro kun mgon du bdag 'gyur snyam/ /ji ltar skye bo phongs tshe bdag gis ni/ /stobs bcus

bstan pa'i lam la gzhag par bya/ /dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di dag bsten pa na/ /'dren pa dag gis spyad la rjes su bslab/ /bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig mtha' yas su/ /lam gol song ba rnams la lam mchog bstan/ /'di ltar bdag nyid chen po'i spyad spyod na/ /mi yis

sngon gyi phrin las byas pa mthong / /rmi lam lta bur byas par rnam rig cing / /de ni dran la pha rol dag la'ang ston/ /stobs bcu mnga' ba'i bka' ni thos nas su/ /stobs chen klu ni yid dga' mgu gyur nas/ /sor bcu'i thal mo spyi bor sbyar btud de/ /byang chub zhi thob bya

phyir rgyal ba bstod/ /rnam par 'dren la bdag gis dad bskyed pas/ /stobs bcu'i mdzad pa dag ni bdag gis bgyi/ /skye bo lam gol 'gro zhing mun gyur rnams/ /byang chub zhi ba thob par bdag gis bgyi/ /de nas klu'i rgyal po sprin chen pos bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su

bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis zhu ba zhus pa/ /stobs bcu mnga' ba skye bo yongs grol mdzad/ /'dren pa rang byung la ni bdag 'di zhu/ /ji ltar ston pa'i sras kyis brtson bskyed na/ /zhi ba rdul med byang chub mchog 'thob 'gyur/ /ji ltar 'bad pa'i brtson 'grus stobs kyis su/ /

bla med byang chub byang chub sems 'thob pa/ /yon tan dpag med ye shes mchog mnga' ba'i/ /drang srong chen pos sras zhus lung bstan pa/ /byang chub don du nga yis sngon spyad pa/ /ji ltar 'gro ba rnams su stobs brtson bsten/ /brtson 'grus stobs kyi byang chub ngas brnyes pa/ /

de ni nga yis cung zad bshad par bya/ /'das pa'i dus su mi bdag byung ba ni/ /mi yi dbang phyug mi dbang stobs 'chang zhes/ /rin chen bdun yod bu dang ldan pa ste/ /bdag las skyes pa khri phrag brgya dag byung / /de tshe 'jig rten khams 'di 'ang rgyas pa ste/ /ri bong bdag

ces sangs rgyas zhing dag byung / /der ni mi mchog rang byung byung gyur pa/ /rin chen dpal zhes 'jig rten sgra rnams grags/ /mi mchog de yis nyan thos dge 'dun ni/ /sa ya phrag ni brgyad cu dag byung ngo / /bde gshegs mchog gi rjes skyes sras tshogs ni/ /nyon mongs

khro dang nga rgyal 'chab bral ba'i/ /de tshe mi mchog de yi byang chub sems/ /sa ya phrag ni brgyad cu dag byung ste/ /rgyal ba dpag med dag la spyad ldan zhing / /'gro la phan phyir byang chub 'thob 'gyur ro/ /de na rnam par 'dren pa de yi ni/ /byang chub sems dpa' bdud bsten

zhes bya byung / /drang srong chen po bdud stobs rab 'joms pa/ /de yis tshogs kyi gtso bo de byed do/ /de nas bdud stobs bsnyen par dka' zhes pa/ /lha'i bu byung nas 'dren pa rgyal ba'i mchog /de ni byang chub mchog tu gshegs pa la/ /ji ltar mi reg bya phyir bar chad byed/ /

sa 'di rgya mtshor bcas pa yon tan ldan/ /de dag bud med tshogs kyis mngon sprul te/ /bzang mo yon tan rab mchog 'dzin pas bkang / /dga' ba'i tshig dang yid 'ong tshig smra zhing / /mig ni bzang la 'gros kyang ldem bag can/ /glang po'i sna ltar lag mnyam pa yi

mdog /yun ring dag tu brtul zhugs 'dzin pa ste/ /nu ma sra la legs dang ldan pa yin/ /ngag tshig snyan cing pad ma 'dra ba'i mig /so yi phreng ba thags dam 'chang ba ste/ /byi ru'i mdog ltar mchu ni mdzes pa yin/ /bzhin dang 'gram pa dag ni mdzes dang ldan/ /

bzhin gyi mdog ni zla ba dri med 'phrog /'dzum zhing tshig ni snyan pa gtong ba ste/ /glang mchog myos pa lta bur mdzes pa'i 'gros/ /ngo tsha shes pas blo gros ngan pa spangs/ /nu ma sra zhing tshigs kyis zin pa ste/ /rgyal po lta bur

de'i lus 'chang / /bzang mo'i lus ngos srab cing 'jam dang ldan/ /rgyal po'i byin 'dra rtse 'gro zhing / /rkang pa mnyam la 'jol ba'i thabs su 'gro/ /'dod chags ldang bar 'gyur ba'i bu mo dag /bdud kyis sa rnams thams cad gang byas pa/ /dmar

ba zung du ldan pa'i myos ma ste/ /bdud kyis bdud kyi zhags pa mdun du bstan/ /de yi 'dod pa bdud stobs thams cad dag /de tshe bskyed nas bdud bsten 'jigs byas kyang / /nag po'i rtsa lag de yis gtse ma nus/ /bar chad bya bar rab tu ma tshugs so/ /de nas

shin tu mi bzad srin po ni/ /bye ba dag gis tshig rtsub smra bar byed/ /dpag tu med cing bsam yas mu med pa'i/ /lus bong mtha' yas mngon sprul tshig rtsub smra/ /mdung thung mda' bo che yis rgyob shig rgyob/ /'di yi myur du ri yis chom/ /'di yi

snying la gzi brjid yod pa phrogs/ /myur du dus las 'da' zhing 'gog par gyis/ /thang cig tsam yang 'di ni srog ma sbyin/ /ji ltar 'dod pa'i yon tan de bsten na/ /bdag gi rgyal srid gnod pa med par 'gyur/ /nga yi yang dag tshig de thos nas su/ /

rgyal ba'i bstan pa 'phel bar ma byed cig /de tshe bong bu'i rnam pa mngon sprul pa/ /mgo gcig pa dang mgo gnyis pa dag byung / /srin po rnams ni sgra bo che dag 'bod/ /la la mdung dang mda' bo che dag thogs/ /la la dag kyang ri ni khyer ba ste/ /la la sdang ba'i

sems kyis sprul 'dzin cing / /de yi mdun du shin tu sgra dag 'byin/ /de tshe la la gnod sbyin mngon sprul te/ /lus gcig pa dang lus gnyis lag pa ni/ /gsum dag yod cing lus bzhi lag pa gcig /de tshe lus gcig mngon par sprul byas shing / /de tshe de bzhin

mgo bzhi mngon par sprul/ /de nas lus gcig mngon par sprul byas te/ /de dag bong bu ra dang byi la dang / /stag gi gdong ste 'jigs par byed pa dag /so so mi 'dra ba yi skad dag 'byin/ /bong bu'i gdong ni ra yi skad 'byin cing / /ra yi gdong ni bong bu'i skad 'byin la/ /

bong bu glang po'i skad dang rta skad 'byin/ /bong bu gcig gi kha nas skad kun 'byin/ /de tshe ra yi kha nas thams cad skad/ /shin tu 'jigs skad dpag tu med pa 'byin/ /gzhan yang bde gshegs bsnyen par bya ba'i phyir/ /glang po kha nas tshig rtsub dpag med 'byin/ /de tshe

glang po bong bu'i skad 'byin cing / /de bzhin rta dang de bzhin glang po dag /rnam pa mtha' yas skad dag 'byin byed kyang / /bde gshegs ba spu'i khung bu 'ang ma g.yos so/ /rta ni glang po'i skad dag 'byin byed cing / /de bzhin spre'u ni rta yi skad dag 'byin/ /spre'u'i kha nas mtha' yas

skad 'byin kyang / /bde gshegs ba spu'i khung yang g.yos ma gyur/ /rgyal po wa yi skad 'byin cing / /bong bu'i phyugs dang bya byi rta skad 'byin/ /de tshe rnam 'dren gtse bar ma nus shing / /ba spu'i khung bu'ang g.yos par ma gyur to/ /de tshe stag ni phag gi skad 'byin cing / /

de tshe phyugs dang bya ni sbrul skad 'byin/ /rnam 'dren de ni gtse bar ma nus shing / /bar chad bya ba dag tu'ang ma tshugs so/ /khyu mchog seng ge'i skad 'byin cing / /byi la wa ni phag gi skad 'byin la/ /ma he dag ni stag gi skad 'byin kyang / /'jig rten mkhas pa bar chad bya

ma nus/ /de bzhin phyugs kyi kha nas mtha' yas pa/ /rnam pa bye ba sems can skad 'byin kyang / /rnam 'dren de ni gtse bar ma nus shing / /bar chad bya ba dag tu'ang ma tshugs so/ /stag ni khyu mchog skad 'byin cing / /de bzhin bong bu'i skad dang rta yi skad/ /de tshe dom ni

seng ge'i skad 'byin kyang / /'jig rten phan mdzad ba spu'i khung ma g.yos/ /dred ni nam mkha' lding gi skad 'byin cing / /de tshe de bzhin glang po rta skad 'byin/ /rnam 'dren de ni gtse bar ma nus shing / /bar chad bya ba dag tu'ang ma tshugs so/ /nam mkha' lding ni khu byug skad 'byin cing / /

de bzhin ne tso phyugs bzhon skad 'byin la/ /ne tso'i skad ni yang dag skad 'byin byed/ /shang shang te'u'i skad rnams 'byin par byed/ /de tshe ka la ping ka'i yang dag skad/ /de tshe mtshan mo gang la zhe sa'i skad/ /de tshe nyams su dga' ba rma bya'i skad/ /de bzhin

tsan tsa'i skad dang shugs kyi skad/ /phyugs bzhon zhe sa'i skad dag 'byin par byed/ /de tshe ka la ping ka yid 'ong dga'/ /ko ka'i tshig rtsub dag ni 'byin byed kyang / /rgyal ba'i thugs ni gzhan du ma gyur to/ /sbrul ni glang po'i skad dag 'byin byed cing / /de bzhin glang po sbrul gyi skad 'byin

kyang / /rnam 'dren de la gtse bar ma nus shing / /bar chad bya ba dag tu'ang ma tshugs so/ /de tshe ngang pa seng ge'i skad 'byin cing / /de bzhin khyim bya khra yi skad 'byin kyang / /rnam 'dren de la gtse bar ma nus shing / /bar chad bya ba dag tu 'ang ma tshugs so/ /rta ni dre'u yi skad dag 'byin

byed cing / /de bzhin tsan tsa go bo'i skad 'byin kyang / /rnam 'dren de la gtse bar ma nus shing / /bar chad bya ba dag tu'ang ma tshugs so/ /glang po 'ug pa tsan tsa'i skad 'byin cing / /bya dang khyu mchog skad 'byin khrung khrung skad/ /de tshe bya rgod 'dzim+ha'i skad 'byin cing / /bya dang khyu mchog

b+he ri'i skad 'byin la/ /ngang pa'i kha nas skad rnams thams cad 'byin/ /de bzhin khu byug gnod sbyin kun gyi skad/ /de tshe grul bum thams cad skad 'byin cing / /de bzhin kha gcig nas ni skad kun 'byin/ /kha yi rnam pa de las de skad 'byin/ /skad cig tu ni mtha' yas skad 'byin kyang / /

rnam 'dren de la gtse bar ma nus shing / /bar chad byed pa dag tu'ang ma tshugs so/ /klu yi kha nas rdo yi char 'bebs shing / /de bzhin mtshon cha drag po'i char 'bebs kyang / /rnam 'dren de la gtse bar ma nus shing / /bar chad byed pa dag tu'ang ma tshugs so/ /gnod sbyin kha nas rdo

yi char 'bebs shing / /de bzhin me rab 'bar ba'i char 'bebs la/ /de bzhin ri dang phyag dar char 'bebs kyang / /bde gshegs bar chad bya bar ma nus so/ /grul bum mda' yi char dang de bzhin du/ /me 'bar dang ni mtshon cha'i char 'bebs kyang / /rnam 'dren de la gtse bar ma nus shing / /bar

chad byed pa dag tu'ang ma tshugs so/ /de tshe bdud ni sdig can de yis su/ shin tu mi bzad rnam pas gtses byas kyang / /brtson 'grus dpag med stobs ni bskyed nas su/ /bdud stobs sten pa byang chub rtogs par chud/ /rang byung gis ni bdud sde spa bkong zhing / /ljon

mchog drung du skyil mo dbyer med bcas/ /spun pa rlung gis phyar ltar bcom nas su/ /byang chub mchog reg skye dgu thugs su chud/ /de tshe sa ni rnam drug rab g.yos shing / /bsnyen par dka' ba'i sde de phyogs 'tshol to/ /rlung gi rgyal pos bya ni khyer ba ltar/ /bde bar gshegs

pa'i gzi yis rnam par bcom/ /klu dang gnod sbyin srin po de dag gis/ /de tshe sna tshogs gdong ni mngon par sprul/ /de dag bdud bsten pa yi gzi brjid kyis/ /kha na byed pa yod pa de dag bcom/ /ji ltar nga yis bdud kyi bu mo bcom/ /bud med 'di dag bdag gis der rgas nas/ /

de bzhin bdud stobs bsnyen dka' rang gis sprul/ /bdud stobs bsten pa'i mthu yis bcom par gyur/ /bde gshegs mchog la lha yis bu sprul bkang / /'jig rten rnam par 'dren pas zil gyis mnan/ /lha yi bu mo khri phrag brgyad cu kun/ /bdud bsten pas ni byang chub

dag la btsud/ /rnam par btul cing byang chub mi g.yo gnas/ /de tshe bsnyen par dka' ba sdug bsngal gyur/ /de yi tshe na bdud bsten byung nas su/ /'gro ba de dag bdag gis grol bar byas/ /de ltar nga yis brtson 'grus bskyed pas su/ /de tshe thub par dka' ba'i bdud las rgyal/ /

rdul bral zhi mchog byang chub tshol ba na/ /nga yi sras kyis de ltar bslab par bya/ /sems can bye ba mang po'i don bya zhing / /nams kyang bdag gi phyir ni bde mi bya/ /ji ltar mgo la me 'bar gzhan mi sems/ /skyes bus zhi bya lta bur brtson 'grus bskyed/ /de ltar zhi ba mchog dag tshol

ba na/ /yid kyis yid kyis rnam par bsam par byos/ /de nas klu'i rgyal po zla ba chen pos bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis zhu ba zhus pa/ /mi dang lha yi ston pa kha lo sgyur/ /lha dang bcas pa 'gro 'di'i 'dren pa ste/ /ji ltar bde gshegs bdag 'khrungs dran ldan

pa/ /bla med byang chub thob pa bdag gis zhu/ /'dren pa thub pas 'dir ni srid las rgyal/ /ji ltar 'dren pa bde gshegs bdag la 'khrungs/ /bdud ni rmongs mdzad mya ngan 'das reg pa/ /rgyal ba gang zag mchog gis lung bstan pa/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag

la dran bsdams na/ /nyes bcas 'khor ba'i 'gro ba 'gag par 'gyur/ /skye bo mi mkhas gang la chags gyur pa/ /bde ba rab tu mi shes sdug bsngal reg /dran pa nyams pa 'khor ba de dang der/ /mi mkhas 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal rjes su dran/ /rmongs pa de ni thar ba'i 'gro mi shes/ /

nyon mongs bdud kyi spyod yul dag la dga'/ /log pa rnam par nyams pa'i yid kyis su/ /mi rtag rtag dang sdug bsngal bde ba dang / /bdag med bdag dang mi gtsang gtsang 'dzin pa/ /nyon mongs bdud kyi yul las mi 'grol lo/ /rab nyams de dag gis ni 'gro ba shes/ /

dran pa nyer gzhag lam ni rab tu shes/ /spyad pa spyod tshe 'gro la phan pa'i phyir/ /byang chub byed pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa klus thos nas/ /byang chub gzhal du med la 'dun pa bskyed/ /klu chen zla bas mi 'dul kha lo sgyur/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa

rgyal la bstod/ /dran pa nyams pa'i 'gro ba 'dren pa lags/ /dran stobs shin tu gnas la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub gzhal du med par 'dun pa bskyed/ /dran pa nyams pa med pa'i 'gro ba bstan/ /byang chub gzhal du med la 'dun pa bskyed/ /byang chub dran

ldan gnas la reg par bgyi/ /bdud stobs bdud dpung bcas gzhom spang bya zhing / /bdud kyis dam du bcings pa'i sems can dgrol/ /rgyal ba dran pa nye bar gzhag pa mkhyen/ /klu de'i bsam pa thugs su chud nas su/ /sems can phan phyir klu chen zla ba ni/ /'dren

pas gzhal med byang chub lung bstan pa/ /sngon gyi sangs rgyas bye ba brgyad cu la/ /klu bdag de yis sngon ni bsnyen bkur byas/ /'di nas phyis ni sangs rgyas bye ba bcu/ /byang chub zhi ba tshol tshe mchod pa byed/ /phyi nas de ni gzhal med byang chub reg /rgyal ba'i mtshan ni zla bzang

zhes bya ste/ /bdud kyi stobs ni shin tu stobs nyams byed/ /bdud kyi stobs ni rgyal ba'i stobs byed 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas kyis ni legs gsungs 'di thos nas/ /klu ni bye ba byang chub mchog la gnas/ /sngon med byang chub la ni yid zhugs te/ /sangs rgyas legs par

gsungs la'ang mngon par dga'/ /de nas klu'i rgyal po tshogs byed kyis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis zhu ba zhus pa/ /rgyal ba nyid 'khrungs yang dag 'du gyur pa/ /ma 'khrul sems kyis spyad pa spyod pa na/ /bdud kyi stobs bcas dpung bcas

bcom nas su/ /bla med byang chub zhi ba ji ltar 'thob/ /bde ba'i sems ni g.yo bar mi bya zhing / /nyon mongs bdud kyis stobs ni rnam par spang / /mnyam gzhag rgyal ba'i spyad pa spyod byed pa/ /de ni myur du byang chub zhi 'thob 'gyur/ /lung bstan pas ni klu de dag 'gyur nas/ /

rgyal ba'i byang chub la ni yid 'jug cing / /mnyam gzhag bdud kyi spyod yul las ni 'byung / /'dren la bsam gtan tshul gyis mngon bstod pa/ /spyod yul dang ni spyod yul ma yin mkhyen/ /gang dag 'jig rten 'dren pa khyod kyis bslabs/ /'gro ba de dag bdud kyi yul

las thar/ /chags med thugs kyis dgongs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de ring slan chad rgyal ba'i spyod yul la/ /spyad par bgyi zhing bdud kyi spyod yul spang / /bdud kyi spyod yul las ni 'gro ba dgrol/ /bde gshegs spyod yul la ni yang dag dgod/ /gang zag mchog

gis klu yi bdag po yi/ /bsam pa mkhyen nas byang chub lung bstan pa/ /gang dag nyon mongs bdud kyi yul la brten/ /bye ba tham pa'i klu ni yang dag gnas/ /de nas klu'i rgyal po shugs 'chang gis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis zhu ba

zhus pa/ mi dag 'di ru shes rab la spyod pa/ /'dod la chags med spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ /bdud kyi stobs bcus dpung bcas bcom nas su/ /byang chub gzhal med nyes med ji ltar 'thob/ /'gro kun sgyu ma 'dra bar sus shes pa/ /de ni bdud kyi zhags pas 'ching mi byed/ /

'gro ba 'di dag bdud kyis bcings mthong nas/ /snying rje bskyed de dka' thub mchog la spyod/ /ston pa'i gsung gis klu de dga' gyur nas/ /gzhal du med pa'i dga' bas sems rangs te/ /rgyal ba thub la mkhyen pas bstod nas su/ /byang chub

gzhol ba la ni yid bskyod do/ /klu yi bdag po'i bsam pa thugs chud nas/ /'dren pas byang chub mchog la lung bstan to/ /klu ni bye ba byang chub mchog la gnas/ /'jig rten mkhas pas byang chub de lung bstan/ /de nas klu'i rgyal po nyi ma'i snying pos bcom ldan

'das la tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis zhu ba zhus pa/ 'dren pa thabs la mkhas pa bdag la gsungs/ /thabs gang gis ni spyod pa spyad bgyis na/ /byang chub sems dpa' byang chub las mi ldog /mi mchog 'di dag bdag la bka' stsol cig /ji ltar

yid ni rab tu mi ldog pa/ /bde gshegs gang zag mchog ni khyod las su/ /gang dag thos nas thabs mkhas mnyam par rtsom/ /spyad pa spyod pa rnams ni skyo mi 'gyur/ /'gro ba mi mkhas lam ngan zhugs pa yi/ /'gro ba rnam par nyams la snying rje bskyed/ /'gro la

phan phyir rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chos/ /bdag nyid yongs su btang ste tshol bar byed/ /chos rnams kyi ni ngo bo shes pa na/ /bdag nyid gtong la zhum par mi 'gyur ro/ /chos ni g.yo ba med par shes pa na/ /de bzhin sems can rnams la rab tu ston/ /chung ma bu dang

bu mo bdag nyid kyi/ /mgo yang yongs su gtong la mi zhum mo/ /de ni gang du'ang gnas par mi 'jug ste/ /bdag med 'du shes kyis ni yid la gnas/ /de ni phung po bdag med rab tu ston/ /zang zing med pa'i bde ba'i mchog 'thob bo/ /de tshe sems can bye ba dpag med

dag /smin par byed la dga' zhing zhum pa med/ /ston pa'i gsung gis klu de mgu gyur nas/ /sangs rgyas la ni snying nas skyabs song zhing / /byang chub gzhol la yid ni bskyed pa dang / /'jig rten mkhas pas byang chub de lung bstan/ /de nas klu'i rgyal po gzung bar dka' bas bcom

ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis zhu ba zhus pa/ bde gshegs khyod sras ji ltar spyad bgyis na/ /sangs rgyas byang chub bde bas sgrub par bgyid/ /ji ltar thub pa gshegs ltar myur du mchi/ /dpag med gshegs pa de dag bdag la gsungs/ /rgyal ba mi mchog

rang byung mkhyen pas su/ /byang chub nges la de ni lung bstan pa/ /ji ltar rigs su byang chub spyod pa na/ /nams kyang 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal rnams mi reg /byams pa'i stobs kyis phan par spyod pa na/ /byams pa'i sems ni gar yang mi rmongs so/ /byams pa la ni sdug bsngal mi

'byung zhing / /nyes pa rab zhi spyod pa mi g.yo'o/ /spyod tshe sems can kun la rab tu ston/ /byams pa sgoms shig gar yang ma g.yo shig /rab tu zhi ba'i yid kyis nyes pa chom/ /sems can rnams la phan phyir zhi ba btsal/ /de yis legs pa'i las de byas pas na/ /spyad pa

spyod tshe sdug bsngal mi 'thob cing / /gzhal med byang chub myur du gso bar byed/ /de yi 'khor ni thams cad 'thun par 'gyur/ /ston pa'i gsung gis klu de dga' gyur nas/ /shin tu zhi ba'i yid kyis nyes pa spangs/ /byams pa'i sems kyis nyes pa rnam par btul/ /byang chub

gzhol ba la ni yid bskyed do/ /rgyal ba snga phyi mkhas pas de'i bsam pa/ /rab tu dang ba'i yid kyis nyon mongs btul/ /yongs su dag la shin tu gnas mkhyen nas/ /byang chub mchog la klu ni lung bstan pa/ /bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgyad cu ru/ /byams pa bsten nas ma

'ongs dus su ni/ /rgyal ba thugs dag zhes bya dbang po btul/ /lha dang mi dag gis ni mchod par 'gyur/ /mchog tu dga' ba rab tu mgu sems kyis/ /rgyal ba'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ /tshigs su bcad pa 'di yis rgyal ba bstod/ /rab tu thugs dag nongs pa

shin tu btul/ /gti mug rnam par bcom zhing bdud las rgyal/ /sems can kun la phan pa'i thugs rje can/ /nyes pa'i dug spangs khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de nas klu'i rgyal po thams cad rgyags pas bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis zhu ba zhus pa/ spyad

pa spyod pa'i tshe na thabs gang gis/ /bdud kyi spyod yul dbang du mi 'gyur zhing / /sangs rgyas thams cad kyis ni bsrungs 'gyur ba/ /bde gshegs thub chen sangs rgyas la zhu'o/ /rgyal bas de yi bsam pa mkhyen pa na/ /chags med ye shes kun tu spyan mnga' ba/ /

bsod nams brgya mtshan phan pa'i thugs rje can/ /sangs rgyas stobs la mkhas pas lung bstan pa/ /rtag tu de ni dran pa nyer gzhag na/ /nyon mongs bdud kyi dbang du bya ba med/ /rtag tu rnam dag sems kyis dran spyod na/ /des na bdud kyi dbang du de mi 'khrid/ /rgyal bas legs gsungs tshig

de thos nas su/ /ston pa'i gsung gis klu de dga' gyur nas/ /rab tu sems dang tshig ni gtsang ba dang / /ma smad pa yis bde gshegs mngon par bstod/ /srid pa'i skye la rgyal ba thugs brtse ldan/ /sems can lam ngan rab zhugs gzigs nas su/ /the tsom sel

cing yongs su dgyes thugs kyis/ /rgyal bas bstan pa'i lam la sems can rnams/ /khyod kyis legs gsungs tshig ni thos nas su/ /rgyal ba'i chos btsal spyod pa spyad par bgyi/ /bdud kyi stobs bcas dpung bcas bcom nas su/ /sdug bsngal chos grol

sangs rgyas 'gyur bar bgyi/ /de nas klu'i rgyal po char chen po spyod pa zhes bya bas bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis zhu ba zhus pa/ skye dgu dag la byams thugs skyabs kyi mchog /kun du spyan mnga' rgyal mchog thugs rje can/ /rdul bral byang chub la ni ji

ltar spyad/ /stobs bcu ye shes phung po khyod la zhu/ /'jig rten mgon po bdag gi the tshom khum/ /'gro ba kun gyi bsam pa rnam par mkhyen/ /bde bar gshegs pas klu de dga' gyur nas/ /rang sems shes par bya phyir brtson 'grus brtan/ /ji ltar bde bar gshegs

pas bstan ltar bslabs/ /rang sems shes par bya phyir nges par gyur/ /rgyal bas bstan pa'i lam ni thos nas 'dug /yongs su mgu ba'i yid kyis the tsom bsal/ /dga' bas sa la pus mo btsugs nas su/ /rnam 'dren 'jig rten phan mdzad mngon bstod pa/ /nyon mongs thams cad

bsal ba bla na med/ /khyod 'dra ma mchis gong na ga la mchis/ /ma smad sems can yid ni dga' bar mdzad/ /bde gshegs byang chub mi bzad phyag 'tshal lo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis klu'i rgyal po de dag thams cad kyi bsam pa mkhyen/ las kyang mkhyen/ smon lam dag kyang mkhyen te/ lha

dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi don chen po mdzad nas/ /dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag ltos shig /klu'i rgyal po rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa las 'dul ba thos nas/ /'dul ba'i rtags dag ston par byed/ rjes su chags pa'i rtags dag ston par byed/

rjes su 'dzin pa'i rtags dag ston par byed/ 'dren pa'i rtags dag ston par byed/ /rnam par 'dren pa'i rtags dag ston par byed/ mur byed pa'i rtags dag ston par byed de/ 'di lta ste/ lhag pa'i bsam pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/ /klu'i rgyal po de

dag thams cad kyang / /sems can rnams kyi don byas nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi theg pas yongs su mya ngan las 'da'o/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pas

sems can rnams kyi las kyi rnam par smin pa mkhyen pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen pa nas/ bcom ldan 'das rdzu 'phrul chen po'i bar dang / bcom ldan 'das gzi brjid chen po'i bar dag ngo mtshar che lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das phrin las kyi rnam par smin pa gang

gis bcom ldan 'das gnas mkhyen pa grub lags/ bcom ldan 'das sems can thams cad la thugs brtse bar dgongs te lung bstan du gsol/ ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis lung bstan pa thos nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs

pa'i byang chub kyi spyad pa spyod pa na/ rab tu dga' zhing dga' ba dang / yid bde ba skyes pas spyad pa spyod par 'gyur lags so/ /de skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /maud gal gyi bu legs so legs so/ /maud

gal gyi bu khyod gang de bzhin gshegs pa la don 'di yongs su zhu bar sems pa ni/ maud gal gyi bu khyod skye bo mang po la phan pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba dang / 'jig rten la snying brtse ba dang / skye bo'i tshogs mang po'i don dang phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir zhugs te/ khyod de bzhin gshegs

pa la don 'di yongs su zhu bar sems pa ni/ legs so/ /maud gal gyi bu de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang ngas bshad do/ /tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos bcom ldan 'das la legs so zhes gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang / bcom ldan

'das kyis de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /maud gal gyi bu nga gnas shes par bya ba'i don du 'das pa'i dus kyi byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa dpag tu med pa dag la bsnyen bkur byas te yongs su zhus so/ /dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa de dag gi rnam

grangs des na maud gal gyi bu khyod kyis 'di ltar rig par bya ste/ maud gal gyi bu sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas me tog 'dzin ces bya ba rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/

skyes bu 'dul ba/ kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du byung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas me tog 'dzin de'i nyan thos kyi dge 'dun bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa drug byung ngo / /

de'i tshe bram ze ud pa la'i mig ces bya ba shing sA la chen po lta bu zhig kyang byung ste/ de bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa me tog 'dzin nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa de la gtsug lag khang dbul ba phul nas smon lam btab pa/ bdag gis bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun

dang bcas pa'i gnas bgyis pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gnas shes pa thob par gyur cig /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa me tog 'dzin pa des nga la legs so zhes bya ba rjes su gnang ste/ ud pa la'i mig legs so legs so/ /dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis ud pa la'i mig khyod

ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ gnas shes pa 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /dge ba'i rtsa ba des nga gnas shes pa thob bo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so/ /bsam gtan pa yi gnas byas shing / /gtsug lag khang ni phul ba yi/ /dge ba'i rtsa ba de yis na/ /

ngas ni gnas kyi shes pa bsgrubs/ /ngas dge ba'i rtsa ba de bskyed nas/ 'di ltar sems bskyed de sems can gang dag phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten na gnas shes pa dang yang dag par ldan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba mngon par 'du byed pa de dag thams cad kyi bsod nams la rjes su yi rang ste ngas rjes su yi rang ba'i bsod nams

de yang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngos so/ /dge ba'i rtsa ba des nga gnas shes pa dang / kun 'byung ba shes pa 'grub bo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so/ /gnas ni shes par bya ba'i phyir/ /gang dag

g.yel ba med spyod pa/ /de yi spyod la rjes yi rang / /nga'i sems rnam par ma g.yos shing / /dge la rjes su yi rang ste/ /mi dbang de yi spyod pa la/ /bsam pas rjes su yi rang nas/ /ngas ni de ltar kun 'byung grub/ /nga rtag par rgyun du khams gsum la ma chags pa'i yid kyis

dge ba'i rtsa ba mngon par 'dus byas pa de dag la rjes su yi rang ste/ de dag gi rnam par smin pa la the tsom med pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba des nga gnas shes pa 'gog pa shes pa thugs su chud do/ /lam de yang brtson 'grus brtsams pas thugs su chud kyi le los ni ma yin te/ dge ba'i rtsa ba des nga gnas shes

pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa thugs su chud do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so/ /gnas dang kun 'byung shes pa dang / /de bzhin 'gog pa dag la yang / /lam gang gis ni de 'thob pa/ /rkang gnyis mchog ni de mkhyen to/ /

shes pa de dang ldan pa yi/ /byang chub sems dpa' 'jigs med pa/ /'jig rten kun la phan pa'i phyir/ /'dren pas de ni grol bar byed/ /maud gal gyi bu nga gnas ma yin pa shes par bya ba'i don du dge ba'i rtsa ba dpag tu med pa dag bskyed de/ maud gal gyi bu sngon

byung ba 'das pa'i dus 'khor ba dpag tu med pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa mi gnas par spyod pa zhes bya ba ston pa 'jig rten du byung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa mi gnas par spyod pa de'i nyan thos 'dus pa gcig ni drug khri brgyad stong byung ngo / /

de'i tshe na khyim bdag thos spyod ces bya ba zhig kyang byung ste/ des de bzhin gshegs pa mi gnas par spyod pa de'i yo byad thams cad sbyar nas smon lam 'di skad btab bo/ /bdag dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis mi gnas pa'i chos thob par gyur cig ces btab ste/ de'i rgyur byas pa'i chos

gang la yang smon lam ma btab bo/ /dge ba'i rtsa ba mngon par 'dus byas pa des nga srid pa pa dang / 'gro ba dang / 'chi ba dang / skye ba thams cad la gang gi gzhi'i gnas ldog pa ni nga la med de/ dge ba'i rtsa ba des nga gnas ma yin pa shes pa thugs su chud do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das

kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so/ /rten pa med pa'i sems kyis su/ /tshul khrims bzod pa'i stobs la brten/ /gang gis 'gro ba spungs byas pa/ /gnas ma yin gyi shes pa thob/ /ngas sems can dpag tu med pa dag gnas ma yin pa shes pa la

btsud cing dge ba'i rtsa ba yang bskyed la/ nga dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag la yang gus par rjes su yi rang ste/ dge ba'i rtsa ba des nga gnas ma yin pa shes pa dang / kun 'byung ba shes pa mngon par grub bo/ /dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang ngas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub

ma gtogs par phung po dag mngon par 'grub par byed pa gar yang ma bsngos so/ /dge ba'i rtsa ba des nga gnas ma yin pa shes pa 'gog pa shes pa mngon par grub bo/ /nga lam gyi shes pa 'di bsgrub pa'i don du 'di lta ste/ dge ba'i rtsa ba dpag tu med pa dag mngon par 'dus byas

pa ni maud gal gyi bu sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus 'khor ba dpag tu med pa na de bzhin gshegs pa zug rngu 'byin ces bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ de'i nyan thos 'bum tshang bar byung ngo / /de'i tshe dbang pos byin zhes bya ba bram ze shing sA la chen po lta bu zhig kyang byung ste/ de de bzhin gshegs

pa zug rngu 'byin pa nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa'i yo byad thams cad lo khrir sbyar to/ /maud gal gyi bu de'i tshe de'i dus na dbang pos byin zhes bya ba bram ze shing sA la chen po lta bur gyur pa de gzhan yin par sems na khyod kyis de ltar mi blta ste/ de'i tshe de'i dus na nga bram ze dbang pos

byin zhes bya ba shing sA la chen po lta bur gyur to/ /maud gal gyi bu chen po de lta bas na/ gnas ma yin pa shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes par 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpas dge ba mngon par 'dus byas te/ bag yod pas gnas ma yin pa shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes

par yongs su bsngo bar bya'o/ /maud gal gyi bu gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pas sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/ lhag pa'i tshul khrims kyi bslab pa yang dag par blang ba la kun tu bsten cing bsgoms te mang du mdzad do/ /de las kyi rnam par smin pa des zhabs shin tu brtan par

gnas te/ sku la skyes bu chen po'i mtshan mnga' bar gyur/ phyag bzang zhing dpe byad mnga' bar gyur cing gnas ma yin pa shes pa'ang brnyes so/ /lhag pa'i tshul khrims kyi bslab pa yang dag par blang ba de la skye bo mang po yang dag par 'dzin du bcug ste/ dge ba'i rtsa ba des nga gnas ma yin pa shes

pa kun 'byung ba shes pa brnyes so// //bam po bcu gsum pa/ ngas lhag pa'i tshul khrims kyi bslab pa yang dag par blang ba de'i bsngags pa brjod de/ de'i las kyi rnam par smin pa des nga gnas ma yin pa shes pa 'gog pa shes pa brnyes so/ /lhag pa'i tshul khrims kyi bslab

pa yang dag par blang ba de la ngas skye bo'i tshogs mang po rab tu bkod de/ las kyi rnam par smin pa des nga gnas ma yin pa shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa brnyes so/ /ngas phyir mi 'phrogs pa yang thugs su chud de/ maud gal gyi bu nga sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na

dam bcas pa las nam yang 'gal bar ma byas te/ ngas ji ltar dam bcas pa de ltar byas so/ /maud gal gyi bu sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus de'i pha rol gyi yang ches pha rol na rgyal po dpal gyi snying po zhes bya ba gdugs gcig pa sa rnams kyi dbang phyug sbyin pa po sbyin bdag dam bcas par

don yod par byed pa/ dam bcas pa las mi 'da' ba zhig byung ngo / /de'i tshe bram ze tshangs pa'i lha zhes bya ba zhig rgyal po dpal gyi snying po ga la ba der song ste phyin nas rgyal ba zhes brjod de/ tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis blangs pa/ sa dbang dpal gyi snying po

rgyal bar spyon/ /yon tan ldan pas rgya mtsho sar bcas skyongs/ /bdag gi mchis brang du ni sras mo stsol/ /bdag slong 'bras bu yod par rgyal pos mdzod/ /bram ze de dka' thub spyod pa yin te/ bdag gi lus shin tu skem la skra ser/ so mi sdug cing dkar la gtsigs

pa/ shel gyi mig la blta na mi bzad cing / ral pa'i thor tshugs can de mthong nas/ rgyal po de 'jigs shing skrag la mi dga' ste/ ba spu'i khung bu zing zhes byed par gyur pa nas/ 'jigs par sems pa'i rjes su zhugs pa'i bar du gyur te/ gal te bu mo 'di ma byin na/

de bdag la dmod pa byed par 'gyur/ gzhan yang bdag gis sems can thams cad la bkur sti bya ba yin te/ bdag gis dam bcas pa dang yang 'gal bar 'gyur ro snyam mo/ /bu mo de ni yul gyi bzang mo zhes bya ste/ gzugs bzang zhing mdzes la blta na sdug pa/ rgyal

po'i khyad par du 'phags pa'i tshul thams cad dang ldan pa zhig byung bar gyur to/ /de 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gis sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par bya bar de ltar bdag gis dam bcas na/ drang srong 'di ni gzugs mi sdug la/ bdag gi bu mo 'di ni

mchog tu gzugs bzang ba yin te/ 'di ltar de'i bdag por mi dga' bar 'gyur bas dam bcas pa gzhig par bya'o snyam ste/ de sems pa 'di la zhugs nas sems khong du chud cing 'dug go/ /de nas bu mo yul gyi bzang mo des/ pha de la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ yab

cig dgongs shing shin tu dgongs par mdzad/ /bram ze'i tshig las 'gal bar ma mdzad cig /'di 'dra'i las kyis bdag bskyed yab yum la'ang / /dbang mi mnga' bas khyim thab de stsol cig /de nas rgyal po dpal gyi snying po bu mo de'i tshig thos nas/ mgu zhing

dga' la yi rangs te/ rab tu dga' zhing bde ba dang yid bde ba skyes nas/ bu mo yul gyi bzang mo de bram ze de la byin no/ /de nas bram ze des bu mo de blangs nas song ste/ bu bskyed nas chung ma dang bu bzhag ste/ yang rab tu byung ngo / /rgyal po des bram ze de'i bsam pa

yongs su rdzogs par byas pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba des gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams dang brtul zhugs 'dra bar skyes te/ de 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i ris drug gi tshe'i tshad yongs su rdzogs par byas nas/ mir skyes pa na phyir mi 'phrogs pa'i chos thams cad thob bo/ /maud gal

gyi bu de'i tshe de'i dus na/ rgyal po dpal gyi snying po zhes bya ba de gzhan ma yin te/ nga de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po dpal gyi snying po zhes bya bar gyur to/ /dge ba'i rtsa ba des nga gnas ma yin pa shes pa thob cing bdud kyi zhags pa thams cad kyis kyang phyir mi 'phrogs so/ /

maud gal gyi bu des na nga byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/ sems can dpag tu med pa dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di yang dag par 'dzin du bcug pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba des/ nga gnas ma yin pa shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa thob cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di'i rnam par smin pa la the tsom med

de/ de'i las kyi rnam par smin pas nga gnas ma yin pa shes pa 'gog pa shes pa thugs su chud pa/ mtshan dang dpe byad phun sum tshogs pa'ang brnyes so/ /ngas gang gi tshe dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di dag mngon par 'dus byas te/ sems can rnams dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di la bcug pa des nga

rab tu dga' ba gzhal du med pa skyes te/ dge ba'i rtsa ba des nga gnas ma yin pa shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa thob ste/ shes pa gang dang ldan pas bdag dang sems can rnams kyi gnas ma yin pa shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa so sor shes so/ /de nas bcom

ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so/ /gnas ma yin pa shes pa rgyur bcas dang / /de bzhin 'gog dang lam dang sems can gyi/ /spyod dang bsam pa nges par de yi mthus/ /ngas ni brtag dang spyod pa kun tu shes/ /maud gal gyi bu de la de bzhin

gshegs pa yun ring du byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na rtag par rab tu dran pa nye bar gzhag par gyur te/ dran pa'i dbang po gang gis nga shin tu nye bar gnas pas yun ring por byas pa dang / yun ring por bshad pa ma brjod de/ maud gal gyi bu sngon byung ba 'das pa'i

dus 'khor ba dpag tu med pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'jigs sgrogs bla ma zhes bya ba nas rgya cher sbyar te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi bar du 'jig rten du byung ngo / /de bzhin gshegs pa 'jigs sgrogs bla ma de'i rim gro pa/ dge slong yid du 'ong zhes bya bar gyur te/

de lo bye ba phrag drug cur de bzhin gshegs pa 'jigs sgrogs bla ma de'i rim gro pa byas shing yid du 'ong ste/ yid du mi 'ong ba ma yin pas bshad pa yang 'dzin la/ rang gi don kyang mi gtong ngo / /sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi bskal pa gcig po de la sangs rgyas khri nyis stong byung ste/ de dag
