bzhag mdzad pa/ /mi rten khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /mnyam par byon cing mnyam par gshegs/ /mnyam pa nyid la gnas pa po/ /mnyam zhing 'khrugs par mi mdzad pa/ /mi rten khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /mnyam pa nyid la zhugs gyur cing / /chos rnams kun la mnyam par

bzhag /mtshan ma med la zhugs gyur pa/ /mi rten khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /mi gnas dmigs pa mi mnga' ba/ /shes rab bsags shing mnyam par bzhag /chos la mnga' dbang brnyes gyur pa/ /mi rten khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sems can kun gyi sgra skad dang / /de

bzhin gzugs dang spyod lam dag /skad cig gcig gis gzigs mdzad pa/ /mi rten khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /ming dang gzugs las rnam par grol/ /rgyu dang phung po thams cad bcad/ /rnam pa med la 'jug mdzad pa/ /mi rten khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /mtshan ma dag

dang rnam bral zhing / /mtshan ma'i rnam pa rnam par spangs/ /mtshan ma med la 'jug mdzad pa/ /mi rten khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /yang dag rtog pa rnam ma brtags/ /thugs yid rab tu mi gnas shing / /yid mdzad mi mnga' mi dgongs pa/ /mi rten khyod la phyag 'tshal

lo/ /nam mkha' 'dra bar gnas mi mnga'/ /thogs pa mi mnga' spros mi mnga'/ /nam mkha' mnyam pa'i thugs mnga' ba/ /mi rten khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /nam mkha' dbus mtha' ma mchis pa/ /sangs rgyas chos nyid de dang 'dra/ /dus gsum yang dag 'das gyur

pa/ /mi rten khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /nam mkha'i mtshan nyid sangs rgyas te/ /nam mkha'ang mtshan nyid mchis ma lags/ /rgyu dang 'bras bu rnam grol ba/ /mi rten khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /ngar 'dzin mi mnga' sgra mi mnga'/ /gzung ba ma mchis chu zla

'dra/ /chos rnams kun la mi gnas pa/ /mi rten khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /phung po rnams dang skye mched dang / /khams rnams dag la mi gnas la/ /phyin ci log las rnam par grol/ /mi rten khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /mtha' gnyis dag las rnam grol zhing / /bdag tu lta ba

yang dag bcad/ /chos dbyings mnyam pa nyid brnyes pa/ /mi rten khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gzugs kyi grangs las rnam grol zhing / /dam chos ma lags rnam par spangs/ /len dang gtong ba mi mnga' ba/ /mi rten khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bdud kyi ming las rab 'das shing / /

chos kun rtogs par thugs su chud/ /sgrib pa mi mnga' chos gyur pa/ /mi rten khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /don 'tshal rnams kyis mchis mi brjod/ /ma mchis shes kyang brjod mi bgyi/ /lan med tshig lam ma mchis pa/ /mi rten khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gnyis kyi chos la mi

rten par/ /theg pa'i rgyal mtshan kun tu btsugs/ /gnyis dang gnyis med rnam grol ba/ /mi rten khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /khyod kyis yid kyi nyes pa dang / /lus kyi nad bzhi pham par mdzad/ /bsam yas dpe dang rnam bral ba/ /mi rten khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /lhun gyis grub

par 'jug mdzad cing / /nyes pa thams cad rnam par spangs/ /spyod pa mkhyen pas thog drangs pa/ /mi rten khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /khyod dgongs zhi zhing zag mi mnga'/ /'byung min 'byung ba'i bdag nyid can/ /gnas dang rtog pa mi mnga' ba/ /mi rten khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /

dmigs pa mi mnga' thugs kyis su/ /kun gyi sems ni rab tu mkhyen/ /bdag gzhan 'du shes mi mnga' ba/ /mi rten khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dmigs dang dmigs pa rnams kyis ni/ /kun gyi sems ni rmongs par bgyid/ /sgrib pa med pa'i chos gyur pa/ /mi rten khyod la

phyag 'tshal lo/ /dmigs pa dag dang sems rnams ni/ /ngo bo nyid kyi mchis ma lags/ /bsam yas mnyam pa nyid brnyes pa/ /mi rten khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gnas pa mi mnga' mkhyen pa yis/ /zhing rnams kun dang de bzhin du/ /sems can kun gyi spyod gzigs pa/ /

mi rten khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyis lan 'ga' yang / /sems dang chos kun gtan ma dmigs/ /chos rnams thams cad kun mkhyen pa/ /mi rten khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /chos kun sgyu ma lta bu ste/ /sgyu ma nyid kyang mchis ma lags/ /sgyu ma'i chos

las rnam grol ba/ /mi rten khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rdzogs sangs 'jig rten spyod mdzad kyang / /'jig rten chos la rten mi mdzad/ /'jig rten rnam rtog mi mnga' ba/ /mi rten khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /stong phyir stong la spyod mdzad cing / /khyod nyid stong zhing spyod

yul stong / /stong pa stong par ston mdzad pa/ /mi rten khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sgyu ma lta bu'i ting 'dzin dang / /sgyu 'phrul chen pos rnam 'phrul zhing / /tha dad ma mchis snyoms zhugs pa/ /mi rten khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /du ma ma lags gcig ma lags/ /

ring dang nye la mi 'jug cing / /gdeg dang gzhag pa mi mnga' ba/ /mi rten khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rdo rje lta bu'i ting 'dzin gyis/ /skad cig gcig la mngon sangs rgyas/ /dngos ma mchis par mnyam gzhag pa/ /mi rten khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'dren pa dus rnams thams

cad du/ /mi g.yo mya ngan 'das pa rtogs/ /sna tshogs thabs dang ldan pa po/ /mi rten khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sems can rnams kyi brgyud pa'i thabs/ /mkhyen pas mkhas par gyur pa lags/ /de phyir mi g.yo mya ngan 'das/ /mi rten khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /

mtshan ma mi mnga' lhun gyis grub/ /spros pa mi mnga' skyon mi mnga'/ /snang med bdag gi mi mnga' ba/ /mi rten khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rnam rtog mi mnga' skyon mi mnga'/ /bdag gis bdag nyid ji bzhin par/ /kun tu mkhyen pa thams cad mkhyen/ /mi rten khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /

stobs bcu chu bo rgal ba khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'jigs bral 'jigs med stsol ba khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /ma 'dres chos rnams nges par thugs su chud gyur pa/ /'gro ba kun gyi 'dren pa khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /kun sbyor 'ching ba bcad pa khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /

pha rol byon te thang la bzhugs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /skye bo ngal ba'i rnam 'dren khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'khor bar gshegs shing mi gnas pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'gro ba thams cad dag na sems can rnams dang ni/ /thabs cig bzhugs kyang thugs yid rab tu dben gyur pa/ /

ji ltar pad ma chab kyis gos par mi 'gyur zhing / /sangs rgyas thub pa khyod kyis stong nyid shin tu bsten/ /mtshan ma thams cad rnam pa kun tu rnam par bshig /khyod la gar yang smon par mdzad pa mchis ma lags/ /ston pa'i go 'phang bla med dben pa nyid lags te/ /dmigs med

chu bo rgal ba khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas mthu chen bsam gyis khyab pa ma lags te/ /mi gnas nam mkha' mnyam pa nyid la phyag 'tshal lo/ /yon tan kun gyi mchog mnga' khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dpal 'phags lhun po 'dra ba khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de nas bcom

ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ 'jam dpal legs so legs so/ /'jam dpal khyod kyis legs par smras so/ /'jam dpal de de bzhin te/ 'jam dpal sangs rgyas rnams ni gzugs las blta bar mi bya ste/ chos las ma yin/ mtshan

ma las ma yin/ chos kyi dbyings las kyang ma yin no/ /sangs rgyas rnams ni nyag gcig bzhugs pa ma yin/ skye bo mang po'i nang na bzhugs pa ma yin no/ /sangs rgyas rnams ni sus kyang mthong ba ma yin/ thos pa ma yin/ mchod pa ma yin te/ mchod par byed pa yang ma yin no/ /sangs

rgyas rnams ni chos 'ga' yang gcig pa nyid dam/ mang po nyid du mi mdzad pa yin no/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi byang chub brnyes pa med do/ /sangs rgyas rnams ni chos gang gis kyang rab tu 'byed par mi byed do/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyis ni chos 'ga' yang ma gzigs/ /ma gsan ma dgongs/ rnam

par mi mkhyen/ kun tu mi mkhyen to/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyis ni ma gsungs/ ma brjod do/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyis ni mi gsung mi brjod do/ /sangs rgyas rnams ni gsung bar mi 'gyur brjod par mi 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas rnams ni mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi mdzad

do/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyis ni chos gang yang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang ma rgyas so/ /sangs rgyas rnams ni nyon mongs pa ma spangs so/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyis ni rnam par byang ba mngon sum du ma mdzad do/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyis ni chos gang yang ma gzigs/ ma gsan/

ma myangs/ ma mnams/ ma reg /mi mkhyen to/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jam dpal chos thams cad ni gzod ma nas yongs su dag pa yin pa'i phyir ro/ /'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la mos pa gang la la zhig gis stong gsum gyi stong chen

po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi sems can rang rgyal ba nyid la bkod pa bas ni 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' gzhan gang zhig chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la mos par gyur na/ /de ni de bas ches bsod nams mang du skyed par gyur na/ gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di

yi ger 'dri 'am/ yi ger 'drir 'jug pa lta smos kyang ci dgos te/ de ni de bas ches bsod nams mang du bskyed par 'gyur ro/ /'jam dpal yongs su brtag pa nye bar bzung na/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na sems can sgo nga las skyes pa dang / mngal

nas skyes pa dang / drod gsher las skyes pa dang / rdzus te skyes pa dang / gzugs can dang / gzugs med pa dang / 'du shes can dang / 'du shes med pa dang / rkang pa med pa dang / rkang gnyis pa dang / rkang bzhi pa dang rkang gang ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad

snga phyi med par mi'i lus thob par gyur la/ mi'i lus thob nas kyang byang chub tu sems bskyed par gyur la/ byang chub tu sems bskyed nas kyang / byang chub sems dpa' re res kyang sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang bcas/ nyan thos dang bcas pa/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing

gang gA'i bye ma ltar grangs med pa'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed dag la/ bskal pa gang gA'i bye ma ltar grangs med pa snyed du na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gyi gsos sman dang / yo byad rnams kyis bsnyen bkur byed cing / bde ba'i yo byad

thams cad kyang nye bar sgrub par byed la/ de dag yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i mchod rten rin po che las byas pa'i 'phang du dpag tshad brgya yod pa/ rin po che'i lan kan gyis yongs su bskor ba/ nor bu dang / mu tig dang / rin po che'i chun pos mdzes par byas pa/ gdugs dang rgyal

mtshan dang / ba dan sgreng ba/ nor bu rin po che dbang gi rgyal po'i dra bas kun nas g.yogs pa sha stag kyang byed du bcug pa bas ni/ 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa gzhan gang zhig gis sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yul la 'jug pa ye shes snang ba'i rgyan

zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas mos par byed/ 'jug par byed/ yid ches par byed cing / yongs su rtogs par byas nas kyang tha na tshig bzhi pa'i tshigs su bcad pa gcig tsam zhig lung 'bogs par byed na de ni de bas ches sangs rgyas kyi ye shes rjes su rtogs par 'gyur

ba'i bsod nams grangs med pa bskyed par 'gyur te/ bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa de la byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi sbyin pa las byung ba'i bsod nams mngon par 'du bya ba snga ma des ni brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/ /stong gi cha dang / 'bum gyi cha dang / bye ba phrag 'bum gyi

cha dang / grangs dang cha dang bgrang ba dang dpe dang / rgyur yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/ /'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa gang la la zhig gis sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dang bcas pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa gang gA'i bye ma ltar grangs med pa snyed cig la bskal pa

gang gA'i bye ma ltar grangs med pa snyed du/ /na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang snyun gyi gsos sman dang / yo byad rnams kyis bsnyen bkur byed pa bas ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rab tu byung ba tshul khrims dang ldan pa/ bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa gzhan gang gis

tha na dud 'gro'i skye gnas su skyes pa'i sems can la sbyin pa kham gcig tsam zhig byin par gyur na/ bsod nams mngon par 'du bya ba de la bsod nams mngon par 'du bya ba snga ma des brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/ /stong gi cha dang / 'bum gyi cha dang / bye ba phrag 'bum gyi cha dang /

grangs dang / cha dang / bgrang ba dang / dpe dang rgyur yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/ /'jam dpal gal te byang chub sems dpa' rab tu byung ba tshul khrims dang ldan pa stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed dag las byang chub sems dpa' re res kyang phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas byang chub

sems dpa' dang bcas/ nyan thos dang bcas pa gang gI'i bye ma ltar grangs med pa snyed dag la bskal pa gang gA'i bye ma ltar grangs med pa snyed du na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang snyun gyi gsos sman dang / yo byad rnams kyis bsnyen bkur byed par gyur

na/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi sbyin pa las byung ba'i bsod nams mngon par 'du bya ba gang yin pa de la ni byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa'am/ rab tu byung ba bsam pa dag pa/ tshul khrims dang ldan pa gzhan gang zhig gi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas mos par byed/

'jug par byed/ yid ches par byed/ yi ger 'dri bar byed/ yi ger 'drir 'jug par byed na bsod nams mngon par 'du bya ba de la byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi sbyin pa las byung ba'i bsod nams mngon par 'du bya ba snga ma des ni brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/ /stong gi cha dang /

'bum gyi cha dang / bye ba phrag 'bum gyi cha dang / grangs dang cha dang bgrang ba dang / dpe dang rgyur yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/ /'jam dpal gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhig gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che sna bdun gyis yongs su bkang ste/

sangs rgyas rnams la dbul bar 'bul zhing / de ltar phul bas bskal pa stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed du 'bul bar phul ba bas ni/ byang chub sems dpa' gzhan gang zhig gi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di las tha na tshig bzhi pa'i tshigs su bcad pa

gcig tsam zhig byang chub sems dpa' gzhan la bstan par gyur na/ bsod nams mngon par 'du bya ba de la bsod nams mngon par 'du bya ba snga ma des ni brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/ /stong gi cha dang / 'bum gyi cha dang / bye ba phrag 'bum gyi cha dang / grangs dang / cha dang /

bgrang ba dang / dpe dang rgyur yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/ /'jam dpal bskal pa stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed du sbyin pa'i bsod nams mngon par 'du bya ba lta zhog gi /'jam dpal gal te byang chub sems dpa' gang gA'i bye ma ltar grangs

med pa snyed cig byung bar gyur la/ de dag las byang chub sems dpa' re res kyang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dzam bu chu bo'i gser las byas pa/ shing ljon pa thams cad kyang lha'i gos rnams kyis yongs su dkris pa nor bu rin po che 'od thams cad yang dag par 'dus pa'i dra bas kun nas

g.yogs pa/ nor bu rin po che dbang gi rgyal po las byas pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa/ nor bu rin po che glog gi sgron ma'i lan kan gyis yongs su bskor ba dag gis yongs su gang bar byas pa gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan bsgreng ba/ gang gA'i bye ma ltar grangs med pa ji snyed

cig sangs rgyas gang gA'i bye ma ltar grangs med pa snyed dag la nyin gcig bzhin du dbul bar 'bul zhing / de ltar phul bas bskal pa gang gA'i bye ma ltar grangs med pa snyed du 'bul bar phul ba bas ni byang chub sems dpa' gzhan gang zhig gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la mos par byas na/

chos kyi rnam grangs 'di las tha na tshig bzhi pa'i tshigs su bcad pa gcig tsam zhig byang chub sems dpa' gzhan la bstan tam/ 'jug par byas na bsod nams mngon par 'du bya ba de la byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi sbyin pa las byung ba'i bsod nams mngon par 'du bya ba snga ma des ni brgya'i char

yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/ /stong gi cha dang / 'bum gyi cha dang / bye ba phrag 'bum gyi cha dang / grangs dang / cha dang / bgrang ba dang / dpe dang / rgyur yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/ /'jam dpal 'di lta ste dper na khams gsum du gtogs pa'i sems can thams cad sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro dang /

dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skyes par 'gyur la/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa zhig gis sems can de dag thams cad sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro dang / dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten nas bton te/ rang sangs rgyas nyid la bkod pa bas ni byang chub sems

dpa' rab tu byung ba gzhan gang zhig gis tha na dud 'gro'i skye gnas su skyes pa'i sems can la sbyin pa kham gcig tsam zhig byin par gyur na/ de ni de bas ches bsod nams mang ba dang / ches bsod nams grangs med pa skyed par 'gyur ro/ /'jam dpal gal te byang chub sems dpa' rab tu byung

ba sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed cig byung bar gyur la/ de dag las byang chub sems dpa' re res kyang phyogs bcu'i phyogs cha re rer sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed dag mthong bar

gyur cing / de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub sems dpa' dang bcas/ nyan thos dang bcas pa re re la yang bskal pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed du na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gyi

gsos sman dang / yo byad rnams kyis kyang bsnyen bkur byed la/ de bzhin gshegs pa re re la yang nyin gcig bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed dag nor bu rin po che dbang gi rgyal pos yongs su

bkang ste/ dbul bar phul ba las ni byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la mos par gyur pa gzhan zhig gis tha na dud 'gro'i skye gnas su skyes pa'i sems can la sbyin pa kham gcig tsam zhig byin par gyur nas/ bsod nams mngon par 'du bya ba de la byang chub sems

dpa' de dag gi sbyin pa las byung ba'i bsod nams mngon par 'du bya ba snga ma des ni brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/ /stong gi cha dang / 'bum gyi cha dang / bye ba phrag 'bum gyi cha dang / grangs dang cha dang / bgrang ba dang / dpe dang / rgyur yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jam dpal 'di lta ste/ chos kyi

rnam grangs 'di thos pa ni byang chub sems dpa' phyir mi ldog pa rnams kyi phyag rgya yin pa'i phyir ro/ /'jam dpal gal te byang chub sems dpa' la la zhig gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can thams cad dad pas rjes su 'brang ba nyid la bkod pa bas ni/ byang chub sems dpa' gzhan

gang zhig gis sems can gcig cig don gyi rjes su 'brang ba nyid la bkod par gyur na/ de ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs med pa skyed par 'gyur ro/ /'jam dpal gal te byang chub sems dpa' la la zhig gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can thams cad don gyi rjes su 'brang ba nyid la

bkod pa bas ni byang chub sems dpa' gzhan gang zhig gis sems can gcig cig chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba nyid la bkod par gyur na de ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs med pa skyed par 'gyur ro/ /'jam dpal gal te byang chub sems dpa' la la zhig gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can

thams cad chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba nyid la bkod pa bas ni byang chub sems dpa' gzhan gang zhig gis sems can gcig cig rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la bkod par gyur na/ de ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs med pa skyed par 'gyur ro/ /'jam dpal gal te byang chub sems dpa' la la

zhig gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can thams cad rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la bkod pa bas ni byang chub sems dpa' gzhan gang zhig gis sems can gcig cig lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la bkod par gyur pa de ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs med pa skyed par 'gyur ro/ /

'jam dpal gal te byang chub sems dpa' la la zhig gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can thams cad lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la bkod pa bas ni byang chub sems dpa' gzhan gang zhig gis sems can gcig cig phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la bkod par gyur na/ de ni de bas

ches bsod nams grangs med pa skyed par 'gyur ro/ /'jam dpal gal te byang chub sems dpa' la la zhig gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can thams cad phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la bkod pa bas ni/ byang chub sems dpa' gzhan gang zhig gis sems can gcig cig dgra bcom pa

nyid la bkod par gyur na de ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs med pa skyed par 'gyur ro/ /'jam dpal gal te byang chub sems dpa' la la zhig gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can thams cad dgra bcom pa nyid la bkod pa bas ni byang chub sems dpa' gzhan gang zhig gis sems can gcig

cig rang sangs rgyas nyid la bkod par gyur na de ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs med pa skyed par 'gyur ro/ /'jam dpal gal te byang chub sems dpa' gang la la zhig gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can thams cad rang sangs rgyas nyid la bkod pa bas ni byang chub sems dpa' gzhan

gang zhig gis sems can gcig cig byang chub kyi sems la bkod par gyur na de ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs med pa skyed par 'gyur ro/ /'jam dpal gal te byang chub sems dpa' la la zhig gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can thams cad byang chub kyi sems la bkod pa bas ni byang

chub sems dpa' gzhan gang zhig gis sems can gcig cig phyir mi ldog pa nyid la bkod par gyur na de ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs med pa skyed par 'gyur ro/ /'jam dpal gal te byang chub sems dpa' la la zhig gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can thams cad phyir mi

ldog pa nyid la bkod pa bas ni byang chub sems dpa' gzhan gang zhig gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la mos shing yi ger 'drir bcug nas gzhan dag la rgya cher yang dag par ston pa dang / tha na sems can gcig cig chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la 'jug par byas na de ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs

med pa skyed par 'gyur ro/ /de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/ /byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig zad pa'i dus mtha'i tshe/ /sangs rgyas bye ba phrag bcu'i dam chos 'dzin pa bas/ /gang zhig mdo sde 'di ni nyan par byed gyur na/ /de ni de bas bsod

nams chen po khyad par 'phags/ /gang zhig rdzu 'phrul stobs kyis phyogs bcur song nas ni/ /sangs rgyas bye ba phrag bcu dag la mchod byed cing / /snying rje bskyed de bde ba kun la chags med par/ /skyes bu dam pa thams cad phyag 'tshal btsud pa bas/ /gang zhig bder gshegs bstan la sems

rab dad gyur cing / /rgyal ba'i chos rnams smon par byed pa'i mdo sde 'di/ /gzhan la yud tsam gcig cig ston par byed gyur na/ /de ni de bas bsod nams 'bras bu khyad par 'phags/ /bde gshegs bstan pa'i mdo sde sgron mar gyur pa 'di/ /gang gis lha dang mi la yang dag bstan byas pa/ /de ni shes

rab rno zhing mthu chen ldan gyur la/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyis yang myur du 'thob par 'gyur/ /gang gis bde gshegs sangs rgyas mi mchog de dag ni/ /phung po lhag ma med par yongs su mya ngan las/ /'das par gyur pa dag gi de 'dra'i sgra thos nas/ /sems can gzhan la'ang yang dag sgrogs par byed gyur

cing / /mchod rten gnam 'phang mtho ba srid rtse'i mthar thug pa/ /khyon dang ldan par gyur pa'ang srid rtse ji bzhin pa/ /rin chen mdzes pas spras shing gdugs dang ba dan dang / /de bzhin dril sgras mdzes par byed du bcug gyur pas/ /'di na byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig 'di 'dra ba'i/ /mdo sde 'di thos

lus la gnas par 'gyur ba'am/ /glegs bam bri ba byas te gzhag par byed 'dod na/ /de ni de yi bsod nams 'bras bu khyad par 'phags/ /ser sna'i dri ma bsal bar gyur cing 'jigs med pa'i/ /byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig chos 'di 'dzin byed na/ /de yi bsod nams dpag tu yod par mi 'gyur te/ /ji

ltar 'dod pa bzhin du byang chub thob par 'gyur/ /mdo 'di bde bar gshegs pa rnams kyis rab bsngags shing / /byang chub sems dpa' mang pos yongs su bzung ba yin/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sku lus nam mkha' yi/ /khams dang 'dra ba thams cad 'dir ni bstan pa yin/ /bcom ldan 'das gyis de skad ces bka'

stsal nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang nyan thos chen po grangs med pa bsam gyis mi khyab brjod du med pa dag dang / lha dang mi dang lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs

pa la mngon par bstod do/ /'phags pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yul la 'jug pa ye shes snang ba'i rgyan ces bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po su ren dra bo d+hi dang / zhu chen gyi lots+tsha ba ban de ye shes sde la sogs pas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa// //
